loans.name: Grupo  Rio Viejo Group

texts.es:
Este grupo se llama Grupo  Rió Viejo esta conformado por seis  personas trabajadoras, alegres con ganas de superarse.
Uno de los integrantes de este grupo es el Joven Frumencio de  veinte tres años de edad, el nos cuenta que se dedica a la venta de artículos de papelería como es: hojas tamaño carta, hojas tamaño oficio, fólder tamaño carta, hojas tamaño oficio, lapices, lapiceros, papel china, papel lustre, cuadernos, libretas, libros y servicio de copias.
El nos comenta también que  unos de sus sueños con el crédito seria engrandecer  su negocio  ya que siempre le a gustado manejar su dinero y con esfuerzo y trabajo sacar buenas ganancias.
Lo que mas le gusta de su negocio es darle una buena atención a  sus clientes y si le hacen algún pedido  de papelería tenérselos a tiempo.
Pidió el préstamo para la compra de mas artículos de papelería como son: libretas, cuadernos, hojas tamaño carta .hojas tamaño oficio, libros  y lápices.
Las otras integrantes del grupo son: 
Fernando-se dedica a la venta de frutas y legumbres.
Araceli Gudelia-se dedica a la venta de frutas y legumbres.
Claudia-se dedica a la venta de pescado.
Pablita-se dedica a la venta de frutas y legumbres.
Bertha-se dedica a la venta de mercancía de  abarrotes.

Le dan las gracias a fundación por el apoyo que les ha dado para salir adelante y mejorar sus vidas y las de su familia.
texts.en:
This communal bank is named "Rio Viejo" ("Old River"). It is comprised of six cheerful, hardworking people with the drive to improve themselves.
One of the group members is young Frumencio, who's 23 years old. He reports that he sells stationery items such as letter- and office-sized paper sheets, letter-sized folders, pencils, automatic pencils, tissue paper, colored paper, notebooks, booklets and books, and provides photocopy services.
He also reports that one of his dreams for this loan would be to expand his business, because he has always enjoyed managing his finances and getting good profits as a result from his efforts and hard work.
What he likes most about his business is providing good service to his customers and meeting their orders for stationery items in a timely fashion.
He requested the loan in order to purchase more stationery products such as booklets, notebooks, letter- and office-sized paper sheets, books and pencils.
The other group members are Fernando, who sells fruits and vegetables; Araceli Gudelia, who sells fruits and vegetables; Claudia, who sells fish; Pablita, who sells fruits and vegetables; and Bertha, who sells groceries.
They give thanks to Fundación for the support they have been given in order to get ahead and to improve living conditions for themselves and for their families.

loans.use: to purchase stationery items for selling.

loans.name: La Guadalupe 2 Group

texts.es:
Este grupo se llama La Guadalupe 2 y esta conformado por  diez integrantes todas mujeres trabajadoras y humildes con deseos  de salir adelante y triunfar en la vida.
Una de las integrantes del grupo es la señora Altagracia una señora alegre y trabajadora , ella tiene  setenta y tres años de edad , se dedica a la  elaboración y venta de  tomales,quesadillas,tacos dorados y venta de dulces.
Ellas nos cuentan que lleva  cuarenta años dedicándose a  la elaboración de tamales y antojitos mexicanos que son las quesadillas y los tacos dorados.
Esta felizmente casada con el señor Asunción Lugrecio un señor trabajador y humilde, con quien tiene dieciséis hijos  que ya están casados.
Ella pidió el préstamo para la compra de más ingredientes como son: jitomate, manteca, chiles, ajos, hojas de plátano, verduras  y carnes frías.
Las otras integrantes del grupo son:
Simona –quien se dedica a la venta de marranos.
Maria – quien se dedica a la venta de antojitos mexicanos.
Juana-quien se dedica a la venta de pan.
Ivonn-quien se dedica a la venta de ropa.
Isabel quien se dedica a la venta de carne.
Rosalía-quien se dedica a la venta de ropa.
Rosa Elia –quien se dedica a la venta de alfarería.
Eva Eugenia –quien se dedica a la venta de refrescos.
Ana Remedios-quien se dedica a la venta de ropa.

Le da las gracias a fundacion por el apoyo que les ha dado para que puedan hacer que su negocio crezca y ofrecerles una mejor vida a sus hijos que son lo  más importante para ellas.
texts.en:
This group is named La Guadalupe 2 and is made up of 10 members, all of whom are hard-working and humble women with a desire to get ahead and triumph in life.

One of the members of this group is señora Altagracia, a happy and hard-working woman.  She is 73-years-old.  She makes and sells tamales, quesadillas, and deep-fried tacos.  She also sells sweets.

The members tell us that Altagracia has made tamales and popular corn-based dishes, which are the quesadillas and deep-fried tacos, for 40 years.

She is happily married to señor Asunción Lugrecio, a hard-working and humble man, with whom she has 16 children.  They are all already married.  She asked for the loan so she can purchase more incredients like tomatoes, butter, hot peppers, plantain leaves, vegetables, and cold meats.

The other members of the group are:
Simona –who sells pigs.
Maria – who sells popular corn-based dishes.
Juana- who sells bread.
Ivonn- who sells clothing.
Isabel- who sells meat.
Rosalía- who sells clothing.
Rosa Elia – who sells pottery.
Eva Eugenia – who sells soft drinks.
Ana Remedios- who sells clothing.

They are thankful to the foundation for the support that it has given them so they can make their businesses grow and offer a better life to their children, who are the most important thing to them.

loans.use: to buy supplies to make food.

loans.name: Tukhtajon

texts.ru: Тухтажон 52 года, замужем, мать пятерых детей. Успешная,пунктуальная,трудолюбивая женщина. С 2002 года она  кредитуется в нашей организации,имеет хорошую кредитную историю. Тухтажон начинала с продажи продуктов питания. Несмотря на то, что она уже женщина в годах, тем не менее она раз в неделю ездила на оптовые рынки для закупки партий продуктов питания. На продуктовом рынке, где она торговала, многие обращались к ней за советом, как поставить торговлю, чтобы получать хорошую прибыль. Тухтажон всем помогала без отказа, и сегодня многие ей благодарны. За счет доходов от бизнеса, Тухтажон поставила на ноги всех своих детей. 3 года назад Тухтажон решила поменять направление бизнеса и заняться продажей детской одежды. И в этом бизнесе Тухтажон успешна. Сейчас начало весны и Тухтажон хочет завезти весенний ассортимент детской одежды и этим увеличить товарооборот. Тухтажон благодарна нашей организации за оказанную поддержку.
texts.en: Tukhtajon is 52 years old, married and is a mother of five children.  She is a successful, punctual and hardworking woman.  She has been a client of our organization since 2002 and has a good credit history.  Tukhtajon started with selling food products.  Despite the fact that she is an older woman, she traveled to wholesale markets no less than once per week to purchase inventories of food products.  Many people at the food market, where she worked, came to her for advice of how to set up sales in order to make a good profit.  Tukhtajon helped everyone without hesitation, and many people are grateful to her today.  Thanks to the earnings from her business, Tukhtajon put all of her children on their feet.  Three years ago, she decided to change her business focus and get involved in sales of children's clothing.  Tukhtajon is successful in this business.  It is now the beginning of spring, and Tukhtajon wants to obtain a spring selection of children's clothing and, thus, increase goods turnover.  She is grateful to our organization for the provided support.

loans.use: to buy a spring selection of children's clothing

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a freezer

loans.name: Nizomiddin

texts.ru: Низомиддину 35 лет, женат и имеет четырех детей. Он очень любит свою семью, его друзья предлагают поехать с ними на заработки в Казахстан, но он отказался и решил развивать свой бизнес здесь. Его жена продает молоко соседям и близким, муж также привозит молочные продукты в городской рынок . Но в основном Низомиддин занимается выращиванием скота. Он получает у нас первый кредит для разведение скота. Его скот находиться на пастбище с утра до вечера, он любит свою работу.
texts.en: Nizomiddin is 35 years old, married and has four children.  He loves his family very much, and his friends offered him to go to Kazakhstan with them for work, but he turned them down and decided to develop his business here.  His wife sells milk to the neighbors and relatives, and her husband also delivers milk products to the city market.  Primarily, Nizomiddin is involved in fattening up livestock.  He is obtaining his first loan from us for fattening up livestock.  His livestock is at a pasture from morning until evening.  Nizomiddin loves his work very much.

loans.use: to buy livestock

loans.name: Luttfullo

texts.ru: Лутфулло 31 год,женат, проживает в районе Спитамен. Имеет 3 детей. Лутфулло  трудолюбивый и умный человек занимается куплей продажей баранов. Он кредитуется в нашей организации с 2011 года. Имеет хорошую кредитную историю. На полученный кредит Лутфулло хочет купить 4 голов молодых баран и хочет расширить свой бизнес. В свободное время он работает таксистом. Лутфулло очень благодарен нашей организации за финансовую поддержку.
texts.en: Luttfullo is 31 years old, he lives in the Spitamen region. He is married and has 3 children. Luttfullo is a hard-working and intelligent person. His occupation is buying and reselling sheep. He has been a client of MDO Arvand, LLC since 2011 and has a good credit history. Using this loan, Luttfullo wants to purchase 4 young sheep and expand his business. In his free time, Luttfullo also works as a taxi driver. He is grateful to MDO Arvand, LLC for their financial support.

loans.use: to buy 4 sheep

loans.name: Marjurie Yanyna

texts.es:
Marjurie Yanyna tiene 37 años es soltera vive con la madre no tiene hijos. Vive en Montalvo Provincia de Los Ríos. 

La ventanilla se llama PITA se encuentra ubicada En el Recinto San Pablo de Pita perteneciente al Canton Caluma a 45 minutos de Montalvo esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas a mantener los cultivos de naranja, guineo, orito, cacao y café. 

Marjurie Yanyna se dedica a cuidar las plantaciones de cacao, guineo, cafe y naranja ya que estos productos son de ciclo largo, las compras las realiza en Comercial San Rafael en Caluma y las vende en Montalvo. 

El credito lo solicita para la compra de insumos como: abonos, urea y fungicidas para la malesa o mala herva, ranger para las enfermedades en los cultivos. El credito le ayudado a incrementar la calidad de los productos y evitar pérdidas en los cultivos. El sueño de Marjurie es compra mas terreno para seguir sembrando. 

Le gusta ser una persona sociable y le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Marjurie Yanyna is 37 years old. She is single, has no children, and lives with her mother. She lives in the town of Montalvo in the Los Rios Province. 

The community bank PITA is located in Recinto San Pablo de Pita, which is in Caluma municipality, about 45 minutes from Montalvo. The bank supports agriculture with most of its members growing oranges, bananas, cocoa, coffee

Marjurie Yanyna's farm grows cocoa, bananas, coffee, and oranges. She makes her purchases in Caluma and sells her products in Montalvo.

The loan will be used to buy farm supplies like: fertilizer, urea, and fungicides for when diseases affect the plants. The loan will help her improve the quality of her crops and avoid any losses. Marjurie's dream is to purchase more land and continue planting.

She considers herself a sociable person, and she likes playing sports.

loans.use: purchase fertilizers and fungicides

loans.name: Josefina

texts.es:
La socia anteriormente se dedicaba al negocio de costurera pero no le fue muy bien en este negocio,ahora se esta dedicando al negocio de venta de frutas como naranjas,platanos,mandarinas entre otras frutas,la socia vende al por mayor a los diferentes lugares donde venden frutas,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de frutas.La socia desea el crédito para comprar frutas como naranjas ,mandarinas y platanos al por mayor.

La socia está feliz con el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This member previously ran a tailoring business, but it was not a success. She now works selling fruits like oranges, bananas, and mandarins wholesale. She sells her products to different businesses which sell fruit. With this business she is able to support her children. She wants to expand her fruit-selling business. She will use the loan to purchase fruit wholesale.

She is happy to receive a loan and pledges to complete her payments on time.

loans.use: purchase fruit like oranges, bananas, and mandarins wholesale

loans.name: Barchinoy

texts.ru: Барчиной 32 года проживает в сельской местности, имеет дочку. Уже 9 лет занимается откормом баранов и коз. На первый кредит она увеличила поголовье молодых баранов, откормив продала, на полученную прибыль она сделала косметический ремонт дома. Ещё Барчиной занимается шитьём национальных платьев и продает их. Она кредитуется в нашей организации с 2010 года. Она хочет увеличит поголовье скота, поэтому она хочет получит у нас кредит.
texts.en: Barchinoy is 32 years old. She lives in a rural area with her daughter. She has been raising sheep and goats for 9 years. With her first loan, she increased the number of young sheep in her herd, then fattened and resold them, using the profits to redecorate her home. Barchinoy also sews traditional dresses for sale. She has been a client of MDO Arvand, LLC since 2010. Barchinoy would like to increase the size of her herd, and so is requesting a new loan.

loans.use: to buy sheep for fattening and reselling

loans.name: Angelica Nelida

texts.es:
Angelica tiene 42 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Ica, El departamento de Ica es el único de la costa sur formado por planicies, también llamadas llanuras costeñas, puesto que la Cordillera de los Andes se levanta muy al interior. En Ica se encuentran extensos desiertos, como las Pampas de Lancha, las Pampas de Villacurí, en donde el calor es muy intenso, ofrece playas y aguas termales, variada fauna marina, museos de sitio y excelentes servicios de hoteles; como buena peruana le gusta mucho nuestra comida por ello uno de sus platos favoritos son los “Tallarines Rojos”, ella solo estudio hasta el quinto grado de secundaria pero le hubiera gustado estudiar Enfermería.

Con mucha lucha Angelica pudo iniciar su negocio de venta de bebidas gaseosas, productos de belleza y chupetes; ella le dedica a su negocio alrededor de 8 horas diarias, ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque sus clientes están a gusto con lo amable que es cuando los atiende.

 Angelica agradece mucho a los prestatarios kiva ya que gracias a su apoyo podrá compras mas mercadería (gaseosas) al por mayor y también podrá comprar productos de belleza para vender, así tendrá más variedad de productos y podrá mejorar sus ingresos, lo que le permitirá seguir luchando para cumplir su gran sueño:” Tener una tienda más grande y tener su casa propia”.
texts.en:
Angelica is 42 years old and lives in the town of Ica. The department of Ica is the only one on the south coast that is comprised of plains, also called coastal plains, since the Andes mountains arise much farther inland. In Ica there are vast deserts, such as the Pampas de Lancha and the Pampas de Villacurí, where the heat is very intense. These places offer beaches and termal waters, a varied sea fauna, onsite museums and excellent hotel services. As a good Peruvian, she very much enjoys the typical food, and one of her favorite dishes is "tallarines rojos" (tagliatelle bolognese). She only studied up to the 5th grade of middle school, but she would have liked to have studied nursing.
With a lot of hard work, Angelica was able to start her business selling soft drinks, beauty products and lollipops. She works about 8 hours a day and believes that her business is doing well because her customers are happy with how friendly she is towards them.
Angelica is very thankful to Kiva lenders because, thanks to their support, she will be able to purchase more merchandise (soft drinks) by wholesale and also purchase more beauty products for selling. That way she'll have a wider variety of merchandise and she'll be able to increase her profits, which will allow her to keep on striving to achieve her biggest dream: "To own a larger store as well as my own home".

loans.use: to purchase merchandise (soft drinks).

loans.name: Altamirano Group

texts.es:
Este grupo se llama “Altamirano”, es de la comunidad de San Pedro, San Felipe del progreso, el grupo lo integran 7 mujeres y 1 hombre muy trabajadores, cada uno de los integrantes de este grupo son casados, y tienen a su familia, y cada uno de ellos(as) se esfuerza día a día por sacarlas adelante, ellos se dedican a criar animales como puercos, borregos, pollos y guajolotes, lo hacen con la finalidad de obtener ganancias y ayudar cuando se pueda con los gastos ya sea con los hijos en la escuela o con la despensa en la casa, también porque no trabajan, es decir no tienen un empleo fijo que les deje un sueldo y desean invertir parte del tiempo en algo que sea productivo y puedan apoyar a sus parejas para que juntos salgan adelante con todas las necesidades que actualmente se tienen, cabe mencionar que las personas de este grupo son muy responsables y trabajadoras, les gusta emprender para mejorar su vida. La comunidad de San Pedro es una de las comunidades más avanzadas del Municipio, se cuenta con todos los servicios públicos como agua y drenajes, hospital, escuelas, gasolinera, además de que es una comunidad con mucha vegetación y poblado, en fin es muy completa, y también es una comunidad que tiene muchos profesionista y muchos niños estudiando. El grupo decidió ponerle “Altamirano” porque es un nombre de un escritor importante por eso llevan ese nombre. 
Los nombres de las ocho integrantes son: 
1.-David S., tiene 42 años, quien solicita su crédito para comprar 4 borregos y pastura para alimentarlos.
2.-Victoria R., 26 años, quien solicita el dinero para compra de 2 borregos, 2 cerdos y alimento para criarlos.
3.-Patricia C. 34 años solicita su crédito para compra de 4 cerdos, 30 pollos, alimento y maíz para criarlos.
4.-Ambrosia G. 62 años solicita su crédito para la compra de 2 cerdos, 10 guajolotes, 20 pollos, alimento y maíz para criarlos.
5.-Anita R. 23 años, quien solicita el crédito para compra de 5 cerdos y alimento para criarlos.
6.-Crescencia G. 45 años, ella pide el crédito para compra de 10 cerdos, alimento y maíz para criarlos.
7.-Teresa B. 32 años, pidió el préstamo para la compra de 5 borregos y pastura para criarlos.
8.-Elvira S. 43 años, solicita el crédito para la compra de 2 cerdos, 2 borregos, alimento y maíz para criarlos.
 La representante del grupo se llama Crescencia, ella tiene 45 años de edad, y está casada desde hace 27 años con el señor Crisanto que se dedica a realizar trabajos de albañilería, juntos tienen 3 hijos, el mayor de 29 años que es casado, la que sigue tiene 20 años y de igual forma es casada y el menor de ellos tiene 17 años y está cursando el último año de su preparatoria, la señora Crescencia y su esposo viven en casa propia es decir es de ellos y no pagan renta. El motivo por el que la señora Crescencia decide unirse a este grupo es porque en él ve una motivación para emprender un negocio. "Soy una persona a la que le gusta comprar y vender mis animales, porque me doy cuenta que a veces mi esposo no tiene trabajo y yo le ayudo, soy de las personas que se dedican a muchas cosas, para ayudarme con mis gastos y ayudar a mi familia, no me gusta dejar de trabajar, me gusta estar criando constantemente y no quedarme sin  nada para ir saliendo adelante". Dice la señora Crescencia. "Mi actividad consiste en: una vez que recibo  mi préstamo me dirijo a las granjas donde venden lechones (así se le conoce a los cerdos cuando están aún muy pequeños), no tengo que salir muy lejos ya que aquí en mi comunidad hay una granja, compro los cerdos que voy a criar y los llevo a mi casa en donde tengo mi corralito, ahí les doy de comer, y los inyecto para el crecimiento, y cuando crecen les compro alimento para engorda, luego los vendo, además la gente de mi comunidad ya me conoce, sabe que yo crío puercos y ellos solitos vienen" dice muy orgullosa la señora Crescencia.
La señora Crescencia dice que hasta ahora gracias a Dios no ha tenido ninguna dificultad para llevar a cabo su actividad, no ha tenido enfermedades y en general le ha ido bien.
Las metas que la señora Crescencia tiene son muy claras, a ella le gustaría hacer arreglos en su casa con las ganancias obtenidas, pero sobre todo quiere que a sus hijos no les haga falta nada.
El préstamo que le otorga la institución, será de gran ayuda para que la señora cumpla sus metas y siga progresando.
texts.en:
The Altamarino group is from the San Pedro community in San Felipe del Progreso.  The group is comprised of seven women and one man, and they are very hard workers.  Each member of this group is married and has a family.  Each one of them strives day to day to get ahead.  They devote themselves to raising animals like pigs, sheep, chickens, and turkeys.  They do this in order to get income and to help when they can with the expenses, be it for their children in school or for the store in the house.  

Also, because they do not work, which is to say that they do not have fixed employment that gives them a salary, they wish to invest part of their time in something that will be productive so they can support their life partners.  They want to do this so that, together, they can get ahead with all of their current necessities. It is worth mentioning that the people in this group are very responsible and hard working.  They like working in order to improve their lives.

The San Pedro community is one of the most advanced communities in the municipality.  It has all of the public services like water and drainage, a hospital, schools, and a gas station.  It is also a densely populated community with a lot of vegetation.  Additionally, the community has a lot of professionals and a lot of children attending school.  The group decided upon the name of “Altamirano” because it is the name of an important writer.

The names of the eight members are:

1.-David S., age 42, is requesting his loan to buy 4 sheep and grass to feed them. 
2.-Victoria R., age 26, is requesting the loan to buy 2 sheep, 2 pigs, and feed to raise them. 
3.-Patricia C., age 34, is requesting her loan to buy 4 pigs, 30 chickens, feed, and corn to raise them. 
4.-Ambrosia G., age 62, is requesting her loan to buy 2 pigs, 10 turkeys, 20 chickens, feed, and corn to raise them. 
5.-Anita R., age 23, is requesting the loan to buy 5 pigs and food to raise them. 
6.-Crescencia G., age 45, is asking for the loan to buy 10 pigs, feed, and corn to raise them. 
7.-Teresa B., age 32, requested the loan to buy 5 sheep and grass to raise them. 
8.-Elvira S., age 43, is requesting the loan to buy 2 pigs, 2 sheep, grass, and corn to raise them. 

Crescencia, age 45, is the representative of the group.  She has been married for 27 years to Crisanto, who works as a bricklayer.  They have three children.  The oldest is 29 and married.  The next one is 20 and also married.  The youngest is 17 and is in the last year of high school.  

Crescencia and her husband live in their own house, which is to say that they do not pay rent.  The reason that Crescencia decided to join this group is because of the desire to undertake a business.  “I am a person who likes to buy and sell my animals.  This is because I realize that at times my husband does not have work, and I help him.  I am one of those people who devote themselves to many things in order to help with my expenses and to help my family.  I do not like to stop working.  I like taking care of the animals constantly so that I am not left without anything to get ahead,” says Crescencia. 

“My business activity consists of, once I receive my loan, going to the farms where they sell “lechones” (this is what the pigs are called when they are still very little).  I do not have to go very far because there is a farm in my community.  I buy the pigs that I am going to raise, and I take them to my house where I have my pen.  I feed them, and I inject them so they will grow.  When they grow I buy feed to fatten them, and then I sell them.  The people in my community know me, they know that I raise pigs, and they come to me,” Crescencia says proudly.

Crescencia says that so far, thanks to God, she has not had any difficulty carrying out her business activity.  She has not had illnesses, and things in general have gone well for her.

Crescencia’s goals are very clear.  She would like to make repairs to her house with the received income.  Above all, she wants her children to lack for nothing.

The loan that the institución grants her will be a big help to her in reaching her goals and to continue making progress.

loans.use: to buy pigs, sheep, and chickens.

loans.name: Nilders Yoel

texts.es:
Nilders es un joven de 22 años, vive junto a su pareja en la ciudad de Ica, El departamento de Ica es el único de la costa sur formado por planicies, también llamadas llanuras costeñas, puesto que la Cordillera de los Andes se levanta muy al interior. En Ica se encuentran extensos desiertos, como las Pampas de Lancha, las Pampas de Villacurí, en donde el calor es muy intenso, ofrece playas y aguas termales, variada fauna marina, museos de sitio y excelentes servicios de hoteles, a Nilders le gusta música y por ello es su pasatiempo favorito, como buen peruano ama la comida por ello uno de sus platos favoritos es el riquísimo “Arroz con pollo”, el estudio hasta el quinto año de secundaria, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar Electrónica.

Con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación logro iniciar su negocio de animación y alquiler de equipos de sonido, puede trabajar alrededor de 4 horas semanales, ya que depende de la duración de los eventos donde el ánima, asimismo su esposa lo ayuda con los gastos del hogar trabajando como ayudante de cocina en un restaurante, el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque muy creativo y cumplido con los clientes.
Nilders está muy agradecido y feliz con los prestatarios kiva ya que gracias a su ayuda el podrá comprar un equipo de auriculares y una laptop para su negocio, lo que lo ayudara a implementar mejor su negocio y poder seguir trabajando para cumplir su más grande sueño:” Tener su casa propia y un auto propio
texts.en: Nilders is a young man of 22 who lives with his wife in the city of Ica. It is in the only coastal plains area on Peru's southern coast, where the Andes run farther inland. Around Ica there are vast deserts, like the Pampas de Lancha and Pampas de Villacurí, that experience intense heat, but there are also beaches, hot springs, varied marine plant-life, museums and excellent hotels. Nilders enjoys music, which is his favorite pastime, and like any good Peruvian he loves food. One of his favorite dishes is chicken with rice. He studied into high school, and he would love to study electronics. With a lot of hard work and dedication he was able to start his own entertainment business and renting sound equipment. He can work around four hours a week, depending on the length of the events he works. His wife also helps with household expenses working as a kitchen helper in a restaurant. He believes that the business is going well creatively and with satisfied customers. Nilders is very grateful and happy with Kiva lenders because thanks to your help he will be able to purchase headphones and a laptop, which will help him better implement his business so he can keep working to fulfill his biggest dream: to have his own home and his own car.

loans.use: to purchase headphones and a laptop.

loans.name: Oyun-Erdene

texts.en: Oyun-Erdene is 24 years old and lives with her husband and two kids in a ger (Mongolian yurt) in Uvurhangai province, Mongolia. Her husband is a cab driver, her elder kid is a school student, and the younger one is a kindergarden student. She started running her small food court business in early 2011. Her foods are delicious and inexpensive. Her income is increasing day by day. Now that her business is picking up, she needs to upgrade her equipment and buy some additional supplies. Therefore, she's requesting 660,000 MNT to purchase flour and meat. She is a young, confident woman who says, "I am so glad that my business is picking up. I will not stop now."

loans.use: To purchase flour and meat

loans.name: Ymar Kelly

texts.es:
Ymar vive en la provincia de Pisco tiene la mayor porción de litoral costero de la región Ica, sobresalen los accidentes costeros de la península de Paracas y las bahías de Paracas e Independencia; lugares donde se encuentran la Reserva Nacional de Paracas. Destacan principalmente los cultivos de algodón, vid, frutales, maíz y productos de pan llevar, también tiene como una de sus actividades principales la pesca, actividad que emplea a miles de pescadores de las caletas de San Andrés, Paracas y Lagunillas. Hay dos formas de pesca; la artesanal y la industrial para las grandes fábricas pesqueras; en el puerto de Pisco hay una serie de industrias destacando las fábricas de harina y aceite de pescado, industria textil, química y metalmecánica. Planta de fundición de estaño Funsur y planta siderúrgica, Ymar vive junto a su pareja y sus 2 pequeños a los cuales ama mucho y por los cuales da la vida.

Con mucho esfuerzo y sobre todo sacrificio logro iniciar su negocio de billar, con este trabajo Ymar ha podido aportar con los gastos de su hogar ya que hace unos meses su pareja sufrió un accidente y por el momento no puede laborar, ella cree que le va bien e su negocio porque brinda una atención muy amable  a los cliente.

Ymar está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a su ayuda ella podrá comprar 2 mesas de billar, lo que le permitirá brindar una mejor atención y los clientes no esperaran mucho; así ella podrá seguir creciendo en su negocio y luchar cada día por cumplir su gran sueño:” Crecer en su negocio”.
texts.en:
Ymar lives in the province of Pisco, which has the largest section of shoreline in the Ica region.  The coastal features that stand out are the Paracas peninsula and the bays of Paracas and Independencia, where the Reserva Nacional de Paracas is located.  The principal crops are cotton, grapevines, fruit trees, corn, and basic crop products.  Fishing is another one of the principal activities, one that employs thousands of fishermen from the coves of San Andrés, Paracas, and Lagunillas.  There are two types of fishing, independent and industrial, for the large fishing factories.  In the port of Pisco there is a series of industries.  Flour and fish factories, the textile industry, chemical and metal manufacturing, and the FUNSUR foundry and steel plant stand out.

Ymar lives with her partner and two young children whom she loves a lot and for whom she gives her life.

With great effort and, above all, sacrifice she managed to start her pool business.  With this job Ymar has been able to help with the househould expenses, because a few months ago her partner had an accident and for now he cannot work.  She belives it is going well for her in her business because she offers very friendly service to the customers.

Ymar is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to their help she will be able to buy two pool tables, which will allow her to offer better service, and the customers will not expect much more.  In this way she will be able to continue growing in her business and fighting every day to realize her big dream, to grow in her business.

loans.use: to buy pool tables.

loans.name: Juan Ramon

texts.es:
Juan tiene 30 años de edad, es un hombre muy trabajador y entusiasta, vive junto a su pareja y su pequeño hijo de 11 años, su vivienda se ubica en el departamento de Ica, El departamento de Ica es el único de la costa sur formado por planicies, también llamadas llanuras costeñas, puesto que la Cordillera de los Andes se levanta muy al interior. En Ica se encuentran extensos desiertos, como las Pampas de Lancha, las Pampas de Villacurí, en donde el calor es muy intenso, ofrece playas y aguas termales, variada fauna marina, museos de sitio y excelentes servicios de hoteles,  el Perú es muy conocido por su comida, por ello uno de sus platos favoritos es el riquísimo “Lomo Saltado”, su pareja es su mano derecha, siempre lo apoya en todo, ella trabaja como recicladora y con sus pequeños ingresos también aporta para los gastos del hogar. Juan solo estudio hasta el quinto grado de secundaria, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar Ingeniería civil.

Juan trabaja como chofer de una mototaxi, le dedica a su trabajo alrededor de 10 horas diarias y puede atender hasta 20 clientes al día, el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy cuidadoso cuando maneja y sobre todo porque es amable y respetuoso con los clientes.

Juan está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que es la segunda vez que le brindan su apoyo, en esta oportunidad con la ayuda brindada podrá darle mantenimiento y reparación general a sus dos motos y podrá comprar llantas nuevas, así seguirá trabajando de una manera segura y seguirá luchando por cumplir su gran sueño:” Darle una profesión a su hijo”.
texts.en: Juan is a very hard-working and enthusiastic 30-year-old. He lives with his wife and their 11-year son in the department of Ica. It is in the only coastal plains area on Peru's southern coast, where the Andes run farther inland. Around Ica there are vast deserts, like the Pampas de Lancha and Pampas de Villacurí, that experience intense heat, but there are also beaches, hot springs, varied marine plant-life, museums and excellent hotels. Peru is well known for its food, and Juan's favorite dish is a delicious traditional meal called "Lomo Saltado." His wife supports him in everything. She works in recycling and helps with household expenses with her meager income. Juan has a fifth-grade education but would love to study civil engineering. Juan works as a motor-taxi driver, working around 10 hours and helping upward of 20 customers a day. He believes the business is going well because he's very careful when he drives and is friendly and respectful to his customers. Juan is very grateful to Kiva lenders because this is the second time you have supported him. This time, he plans to use the loan for general maintenance and repairs on his two vehicles so he can purchase new tires. In this way he can continue working in a safe manner and keep trying to fulfill his biggest dream: for his son to find a good profession.

loans.use: to maintain and repair his vehicle.

loans.name: Luz Maria

texts.es:
Luz es una madre de familia muy responsable, tiene 31 años de edad y 2 hijos, vive junto a su esposo, la casa en la que viven esta ubicada en el Pueblo Joven de nombre “La Matanza” ubicado en la provincia de Morropón en Piura, en el pueblo donde vive sus habitantes normalmente se dedican a la agricultura y comercialización de ganado.

Luz es una joven madre de familia que tiene muchos deseos de superación, por lo que ha iniciado su negocio de venta de chicha de jora (bebida oriunda de los incas), ella desde muy tempranas horas inicia la preparación de sus insumos con los que obtendrá la chicha para ser comercializada a sus vecinos y personas que trabajan en campo, ya su negocio lo viene manejando hace dos años aproximadamente, y es que el apoyo que le brinda su esposo es suma importancia ya que le permitirá lograr sus objetivos.

Ella quiere seguir creciendo en su negocio, y para poder atender a sus clientes necesita de accesorios como cocina, ollas, sillas y mesas en las que pueda brindar una mejor atención, y por eso que esta solicitando un crédito en Edpyme Alternativa por un monto de 1008 Nuevos Soles los cuales invertirá en la compra de sus accesorios.

Pues anteriormente ya ha tenido otros prestamos con nuestra institución demostrando su alto grado de responsabilidad en cuanto a sus pagos.
texts.en:
Luz is a very responsible mother of a family.  She is 31 years old and has 2 children.  She lives with her husband.  The house that they live in is located in the Young Town of the name "La Matanza", which is located in the province of Morropón, in Piura.  The residents of the town where she lives normally work in agriculture and selling cattle.

Luz is a young mother of a family who has many dreams of reaching new heights, which is why she has begun her business of selling "chicha de jora" (a native drink of the Incas).  She begins very early in the morning preparing her supplies with which she will obtain the "chicha" in order to be sold to her neighbors and people that work in the country.  Her business has been in opperation for approximately two years already.  The support that she offers her husband is an important addition since it will allow her to reach her goals.

She wants to continue growing in her business, and to be able to assist her customers she needs accessories like a stove, pots, chairs, and tables with which she can offer better assistance.  This is why she is asking for a loan from Edpyme Alternative for the amount of 1008 Nuevos Soles.  With the loan, she will invest in the purchase of her accessories.

She has already had other loans in the past with our institution, demonstrating her high level of responsibility regarding her payments.

loans.use: buy accessories (tables, chairs, stove)

loans.name: Adjaratou Fatoumata

texts.fr: Madame Adjaratou Fatou, âgée de 43 ans, est une femme au foyer. Elle fait du commerce depuis 8 ans mais vient de se lancer dans l’aviculture avec l’appui de son frère qui s’y connait dans ce domaine. En fait elle détient une petite somme et demande l’appui du guichet pour compléter et pouvoir acheter des poussins. Elle n’a pas de charge, mais nourri une grande ambition par rapport à cette activité : car elle veut un jour élargir le nombre des employés pour générer davantage de profit avec l’aide bien sure des préteurs.
texts.en: Mrs. Adjaratou Fatou is a 43 year old  housewife.  She has been in sales for eight years but just took up raising poultry with the support of her brother who knows this business well.  In fact, she has a little money and is requesting help from lenders to have enough to buy some chicks.  She does not have anybody in her care, but she has a lofty goal for this business:  she wants one day to increase the number of employees in order to generate a larger profit, with help from lenders, of course.

loans.use: to buy chicks to raise and sell.

loans.name: Khady

texts.fr: Madame Khady est une dame de 33 ans  qui fait du tricot depuis près de 17 ans. Elle est mariée avec 4 enfants dont l’ainé a 19 ans et le plus jeune, juste 2 ans. Elle est à sa première expérience de crédit  c’est pourquoi elle préfère prendre un petit montant  pour  aller petit à petit. Si ce n’été pas que sa clientèle et sa  demande a augmentée, elle n’aurait pas besoin de faire ce crédit .Elle va acheter du fil et des perles pour fabriquer des bonnets. Khady n’a pas de charges et avec les bénéfices, elle réussi à épargner  pour améliorer les conditions de vie de la famille.
texts.en: Mrs. Khady is a 33 year old woman who has been knitting for close to 17 years.  She is married and has four children; the oldest is 19 and the youngest is only 2.  This is her first experience with borrowing which is why she prefers to start with a small loan and advance little my little.  If her clientele and their demand were not growing, she would not need this loan.   She is going to buy yarn and pearls for making hats. Khady does not have any debts and with her profits she will be able to save in order to improve living conditions for her family.

loans.use: to buy yarn and pearls to make hats to sell.

loans.name: Rolando Voltaire

texts.es: Santo es un hombre de 46 años de edad y tiene muchas aspiraciones en los próximos años de prosperar su elaboración de pasteles, tortas y bocaditos su historia empezó con la demanda de desempleo opto por realizar pasteles e integrarlos a los lugares donde se vende desayunos, su trabajo lo hace con su esposa, no tiene dificultades, está casado, si tiene3 hijos, su sueño más importante es expandir su negocio y entregar a diferentes tiendas y lugares de desayuno. Por  eso quiere el préstamo para su elaboración de pasteles comprando harina, levadura, huevos.
texts.en:
Santo is a man of 46 years with a lot of aspirations for the coming years for success with his cakes, small cakes, and appetizers.

Out of the difficulties of unemployment, he decided to make cakes and distribute them to places that sell breakfast. He works with his wife and does not encounter difficulties. He and his wife have 3 children. His biggest dream is to expand his business and distribute to different stores and breakfast spots. In order to make the cakes, he wants the loan to purchase flour, leavening, and eggs.

loans.use: purchase flour, leavening, and eggs to make cakes, small cakes, and appetizers.

loans.name: Jacinto Estuardo

texts.es:
Jacinto Estuardo tiene 50 años es casado vive con la esposa y con los hijos tiene 3 hijo. Vive en Montalvo Provincia de Los Ríos. 

La ventanilla se llama PITA se encuentra ubicada En el Recinto San Pablo de Pita perteneciente al Canton Caluma a 45 minutos de Montalvo esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas a mantener los cultivos de naranja, guineo, orito, cacao y café. 

Jacinto se dedica a cuidar las plantaciones de cacao, guineo y cafe ya que estos productos son de ciclo largo, las compras las realiza en Comercial San Rafael en Caluma y las vende en Montalvo. 

El credito lo solicita para la compra de insumos como:abonos, urea y fungicidas para la malesa o mala herva, ranger para las enfermedades en los cultivos . El credito le ayudado a incrementar la calidad de los productos y evitar pérdidas en los cultivos. El sueño de Jacinto es comprar terreno para mejor los ingresos de la familia.

Le gusta que la familia son unidos y es una buena persona.
texts.en:
Jacinto Estuardo is 50 years old. He lives with his wife and with their 3 children. He lives in Montalvo, in the province of Los Rios.

The communal bank is called PITA. It is located in Recinto San Pablo de Pita, which belongs to Caluma cantón, 45 minutes from Montalva. This communal bank is dedicated to agricultural work in orange, banana, orito [tiny bananas], cacao, and coffee crops. 

Jacinto cultivates farms of cacao, bananas, and coffee because these are long-term crops. He makes his purchases at Comercial San Rafael in Caluma and sells in Montalvo.

He is requesting a loan to buy inputs such as: fertilizers, urea, and fungicides for plant diseases and weeds, and Ranger [a pesticide] for plant diseases. The loan has helped him improve the quality of his products and avoid crop losses. Jacinto’s dream is to buy land to improve his family’s income.

He likes the fact that his family is close. He is a good person.

loans.use: fertilizers, urea, and fungicides for plant diseases and weeds, and Ranger for plant diseases

loans.name: Yuvixza

texts.es:
Yuvixza es una mujer de 34 años, tiene 3 pequeñas los cuales son el amor de su vida, ella y sus pequeños viven en casa de sus padres debido a que es soltera y no tiene los ingresos suficientes como para dedicarse sola a sus niñas.

Desde hace un año ella tiene un pequeño negocio de abarrotes, donde siempre está pendiente de realizar la venta de los productos que sus cliente necesitan, es por ello que siempre trata de mantener surtida su tienda, ella es una mujer muy trabajadora y ha demostrado ser muy fuerte frente a las pruebas que le ha puedo la vida en estos últimos años. Ella sabe que tiene sus niñas a las cuales considera como fuente de energía y vigor contante.

Ella inicio en esta bodega con la finalidad de generar los ingresos necesarios, los mismos que le permitiría comprar los alimentos que necesitan sus pequeñas. Anteriormente ella de dedicaba a trabajar en el campo, fue así como junto su dinero y apertura este pequeño negocio.

Con la ayuda de los prestatarios Kiva,  Yuvixza podrá realizar la compra de algunas cuantas cosas para su tienda como azúcar, leche, fideos, entre otro abarrotes. Con este nuevo nivel de ventas desea poder hacer que negocio crezca y así poder impulsarse a la venta de ropa, su gran sueño y meta es continuar dándole duro al trabajo y en su entorno familiar desea lo mejor para sus hijas, para que de este modo puedan convertirse en unas grandes profesionales.
texts.en:
Yuvixza is a 34-year-old woman and has three young daughters who are the love of her life. She and her little ones live at her parents' house since she is single and does not have sufficient income that would allow her to be with her daughters full-time.

A year ago, she started a small grocery business. Yuvixza is always dependent on the sale of products that her customers need. For this reason, she always tries to keep her store well-stocked. She is a hardworking woman who has already demonstrated that she has the fortitude when confronted with the challenges she has had to face in her life within the past few years. Yuvixza knows that she has her daughters who provide her with energy and constant vigor.

She started her store as a way of generating necessary income for feeding her young ones. Yuvixza previously worked on a farm and the money she earned enabled her to start her small business. With the help of Kiva lenders, she will be able to buy a few items for her store such as sugar, milk, noodles, and other grocery items. By achieving a new level of sales, she hopes to make her business grow and be able to start a clothing shop. Her greatest wish and goal is to continue working hard. With regard to her family, she wants to provide the best for her daughters so that they can become successful professionals.

loans.use: to buy sugar, milk, noodles, and other grocery items.

loans.name: Elba Edita

texts.es: Elba es una mujer de 44 años de edad y tiene muchas aspiraciones en los próximos años de prosperar su venta de cosméticos su historia empezó porque se separo de su esposo y no sabía qué hacer entonces una amiga la inscribió en Yambal, su trabajo lo hace sola en el horario que el cliente lo requiera, tiene dificultades son la delincuencia, no está casada, si tiene2 hijos, su sueño más importante es tener más mercaderías en oferta para de esa manera ganar un porcentaje más alto. Por eso quiere el préstamo para sus productos naturales.
texts.en:
Elba is a 44-year-old woman and has many aspirations of prospering her cosmetics sales business within the next few years. Her story started because she separated from her husband and did not know what to do. A friend recruited her to join Yanbal and her job involves working alone on a schedule that is determined by what her customers need. Elba faces difficulties, such as crime. She is not married and has two children.

Her greatest wish is to have more offer merchandise to offer because she can earn a higher percentage as commission. For this reason, this loan will be used to buy natural products.

loans.use: to buy crèmes and perfumes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase school and office supplies.

loans.name: Jose Gerardo

texts.es:
Jose Gerardo tiene 46 años es casado vive con la esposa y con los hijos tiene 4 hijos. Vive en Montalvo Provincia de Los Ríos. 

La ventanilla se llama PITA se encuentra ubicada En el Recinto San Pablo de Pita perteneciente al Canton Caluma a 45 minutos de Montalvo esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas a mantener los cultivos de naranja, guineo, orito, cacao y café. 

Jacinto se dedica a cuidar las plantaciones de cacao, guineo y naranja ya que estos productos son de ciclo largo, las compras las realiza en Comercial San Rafael en Caluma y las vende en Montalvo. 

El credito lo solicita para la compra de insumos como:abonos, urea y fungicidas para la malesa o mala herva, ranger para las enfermedades en los cultivos . El credito le ayudado a incrementar la calidad de los productos y evitar pérdidas en los cultivos. El sueño de Jose es que la familia sea unida y tenga dinero para vivir bien y en el negocio que sea mejor.

Le gusta hacer deporte con los amigos del barrio.
texts.en:
Jose Gerardo is 46 years old, is married and lives with his wife and their 4 children.  He lives in Montalvo, de Los Ríos Province. 

The communal bank is called "PITA" and is located in the San Pablo de Pita Precinct of Caluma Canton, about 45 minutes from Montalvo.  The members of this bank make their livings in agricultural labors.  They take care of orange, banana, baby banana, cacao and coffee plants.

Jose makes his living taking raising cacao, banana, baby banana and orange plants, as they are long-cycle crops.  He makes his purchases in San Rafael's in Caluma and makes his sales in Montalvo. 

Jose is requesting the loan to purchase supplies, such as: fertilizers, urea and fungicides for blights and weeds and Ranger for crop diseases.  The loan will help him to improve the quality of his produce and to keep from losing his crop.  Jose's hope is for his family to be united, to have enough money to live well and for his business to improve.

Jose likes to play sports with his neighborhood friends.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers, urea and fungicides for blights and weeds and Ranger for plant diseases.

loans.name: Las Marias Group

texts.es: El Banco Comunal Las Marías está conformado por 10 emprendedores que son de la misma localidad, cada uno de ellos  tiene su negocio en el cual se brinda ideas para superarse en sus negocios. Este grupo ya ha atenido crédito con Fundación León 2000, y han demostrado ser personas responsable y con buenos valores, este grupo nos expresa que con el financiamiento que se le brindo anteriormente han aumentado su mercadería y sus clientes de igual manera.  La emprendedora Maria Angélica que es parte de este grupo su actividad a la que se dedica es la venta de mercadería en general este negocio lo tiene ubicado en su casa de habitación  y de forma ambulante que visita a sus clientes, con el crédito comprara camias, blusas, sandalia, zapato, pantalones, short, faldas, variedad de cosméticos entre otros productos.
texts.en: The Communal Bank "Las Marías" is made up of 10 enterprisers that are from the same town.  Each one of them has a business in which they offer ideas to improve in their businesses.  This group has already had a loan with Fundación León 2000, and they have demonstrated that they are responsible people with good values.  This group expresses to us that with the financing that was offered to them previously, they have increased their merchandise and their customers in the same way.  The enterpriser Maria Angélica, who is part of this group, works as a salesperson of general merchandise.  She has this business located in her home where she lives and travels to visit her customers.  With the loan, she will buy shirts, blouses, sandals, shoes, pants, shorts, skirts, and a variety of cosmetics among other products.

loans.use: buy shirts, blouses, sandals, shoes, pants, shorts, skirts, and a variety of cosmetics among other products.

loans.name: Ismael

texts.es: Ismael  es  una persona  muy trabajadora, ella  se  acerco a la  institución ya  que  requiere   terminar   la  construcción que  actualmente  esta   realizando  en su  vivienda, ya  que nos  comenta  que  debido a que  no   cuenta   con el capital suficiente  para  hacerlo  no  a  concluido  con su proyecto, el requiere  de nuestro  apoyo  para  terminar  de  construir  las  paredes  de   uno  de los cuartos del  domicilio,  esta  muy  contento  de habernos  encontrado  ya que  ve  en  el  crédito  la  posibilidad  de  brindar a  sus  familiares  y  amigos una mayor  estabilidad  cuando  los  visiten.
texts.en: Ismael is a hard-working man who came to the microfinance institution Credituyo because he wants to finish the construction work that he is currently performing at his dwelling. He told us that he couldn't finish the construction until now because of lack of sufficient capital, and therefore he needs our support to finish the construction of the walls of one room in the house. He is very happy to have met us, because he sees a loan as the possibility to offer more stability to his family and his friends when they pay a visit.

loans.use: to build the walls of a room in his house.

loans.name: Alejandra

texts.es: La Sra. Alejandra tiene 29 años y es madre soltera con 2 hijos que son 3 años y 5 años, ella se dedica a la venta de  empanadas y refrescos de manera ambulante,  este préstamo es su tercera secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra.  Alejandra utilizara este préstamo para la compra de un frízer que será de buena utilidad  para su negocio, Alejandra enfrenta retos en su negocio que son tener mas clientes que la competencia, y utilizara los beneficios en incrementar su capital  su deseo a un futuro es poder comprarse un puesto fijo y de esta manera ya no estar vendiendo de manera ambulante, y así de esta manera poder mejorar su ingresos y por ende su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Sra. Alejandra is 29 years old and a single mother with two children, ages 3 and 5.  She sells empanadas and soft drinks as a street vendor.  This loan is her  third one with Emprender.  Sra. Alejandra will use this loan to buy a freezer that will be very useful to her business.  She faces challenges in her business, such as having more customers, dealing with the competition, and utilizing this increase in capital.  Her wish for the future is to buy a small stand so that she can quit selling as a traveling vendor.  This will enable her to improve her income and her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a freezer.

loans.name: Miriam Gisella

texts.es:
Miriam es una mujer muy trabajadora y entusiasta, junto a su esposo tiene tres hijos, cuyas edades comprenden 14, 13, 11, a los cuales ama muchísimo y por los cuales ella trabaja muy duro para que sean mejores que ella, vive en el distrito de Santiago, ubicado en el departamento de Ica , Perú; es un distrito que se caracteriza por su actividad principal que es la agricultura y la generosidad de sus pobladores,  en su tiempo libre a Miriam le gusta jugar vóley sobre todo porque lo hace junto con sus vecinas y algunos familiares, como buena peruana le gusta mucho la comida, por ello uno de sus paltos favoritos es el riquísimo “Ceviche”.

Con mucho esfuerzo logro iniciar su negocio de venta y crianza de cerdos, se levanta muy temprano para alimentar a los cerdos y sobre todo para mantener su criadero limpio, le dedica a su trabajo alrededor de 4 horas al día, asimismo trabaja en el área de control de calidad en un fundo ubicado en su distrito, ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque cría a los cerdos en un ambiente limpio y los clientes tienen más confianza de comprar a carne.

Miriam está muy agradecida  con los prestatarios Kiva  ya que gracias a su apoyo ella podrá comprar un terreno para poder tener a los cerdos en un espacio más amplio, lo que le permitirá tener más espacio y poder criar mas cerdos, así ella seguirá trabajando para poder cumplir su gran sueño:” Darle una profesión a sus hijos, tener su casa propia y tener una pequeña granja”.
texts.en: Miriam is a hard-working and enthusiastic woman who is married and has three children, ages 14, 13 and 11, for whom she loves and works very hard so they will have it better than her. She lives in the district of Santiago, department of Ica, Peru. This district is known for agriculture, its primary activity, and the generosity of its inhabitants. In her free time, Miriam likes to play volleyball with relatives and neighbors. Like any good Peruvian she loves food, and one of her favorite dishes is ceviche. With a lot of hard work she was able to start a business raising and selling pigs. She gets up very early to feed her pigs and always keeps the pen clean. She dedicates around four hours a day to this job, and she also works in quality control at a farm in the district. She believes her business is going well because she raises the pigs in a clean environment and her customers are very confident in buying the pork. Miriam is very grateful for Kiva lenders because thanks to your support she will be able to buy land so she can have a bigger space for her animals and be able to raise more pigs. In this way, she will continue working so she can fulfill her biggest dream: see her children become successful, have her own home and have a tiny farm.

loans.use: to purchase land to bring on more pigs.

loans.name: Batsuh

texts.en:
Batsuh is a 32 year old man who lives with his wife and two children in Hovd province in Western Mongolia. His wife is a needlewoman and his two kids go to  school. 

Batsuh has been making wooden furniture for 7 years. He is quite experienced in the field and the products he makes are well known in the town. Therefore, he receives orders for his products from individuals as well as some enterprises. He is a talented carpenter who says that "I would like to expand the business by getting the materials in large quantities". 

He is requesting for a loan of MNT 1,000,000 to purchase wood for production.

loans.use: To purchase wood for his carpentry production

loans.name: Carlos Rodrigo

texts.es:
Carlos Rodrigo tiene 48 años es casado vive con la esposa y con los hijos tiene 2 hijos de 16 y 14 Vive en Montalvo Provincia de Los Ríos. 

La ventanilla se llama PITA se encuentra ubicada En el Recinto San Pablo de Pita perteneciente al Canton Caluma a 45 minutos de Montalvo esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas a mantener los cultivos de naranja, guineo, orito, cacao y café. 

Carlos se dedica a cuidar las plantaciones de cacao, guineo, cafe y naranja ya que estos productos son de ciclo largo, las compras las realiza en Comercial San Rafael en Caluma y las vende en Montalvo. 

El credito lo solicita para la compra de insumos como: abonos, urea y fungicidas para la malesa o mala herva, ranger para las enfermedades en los cultivos. El credito le ayudado a incrementar la calidad de los productos y evitar pérdidas en los cultivos. El sueño de Carlos es tener mas produccion y compara mas terreno para dejar de herencia a los hijos para que sigan con el negocio.


Le gusta hacer deporte y pasar con la familia por que son muy unidos.
texts.en:
Carlos Rodrigo is 48 years old. He is married and lives with his wife and two children, 16 and 14 respectively, in the town of Montalvo in Los Rios Province.

The community bank he belongs to is called PITA and is located in Recinto San Pablo de Pita, which is in Caluma municipality, about 45 minutes from Montalvo. The bank members work in agriculture growing crops like oranges, bananas, cocoa, and coffee.

Carlos farms cocoa, bananas, coffee, and oranges. He purchases his supplies in the San Rafael store in Caluma and sells his crops in Montalvo.

The loan will be used to purchase supplies like fertilizers, urea, and fungicides for sicknesses that affect the crops. The loan will help him improve the quality of products and avoid losses from unhealthy or damaged crops. Carlos' dream is to produce more, buy more land, and a leave an inheritance to his children so that they can continue with the business.

In his free time he likes to play sports and spend time with his family, who he is very close to.

loans.use: abonos, urea y fungicidas para la malesa o mala herva, ranger para las enfermedades en los cultivos

loans.name: Buyanhuu

texts.en:
Buyanhuu is 54 years old woman who lives with her two kids in Uvurhangai province in Central Mongolia. Her son is a college student and her daughter studies at the high school. 

Buyanhuu has been trading sheep's guts to the city enterprises. She has made regular partners in the city and gets the supplies from the domestic herders. Her 9 years of experience make her the best in the field. As she spends too much on the transportation, she is planning to get the supplies in large quantities and send them to the city. Buaynhuu is a good- natured woman who says that "I would like to expand the business activities and save for my 2 kids college fees". 

She is requesting a loan in the amount of 2,500,000 MNT to purchase sheep's guts in large quantities.

loans.use: To purchase sheep's guts in large quantities

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda is a 61-year-old farmer from Bien Unido, Bohol. Her husband is also a farmer. They work together to provide for their family and improve their quality of life.

Erlinda works hard to take care of her family and business. She plans to help send her grandchildren to school. Erlinda is asking for a loan to purchase fertilizers, insecticides and other farm inputs. This will help Erlinda fund their farm and improve their harvest.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers, insecticides and other farm inputs

loans.name: Modesto

texts.es:
El señor Modesto es un hombre que junto a su esposa tienen 3 hijos, para poder sacar adelante a su familia ambos trabajan, mientras su esposa labora en un fundo, el se dedica a la reparación de fibra de vidrio para automóviles. Actualmente él y su familia viven en la ciudad de Ica, caracterizada por la agro-exportación de espárragos y alcachofas a distintas partes del mundo, tierra conocida y aclamada por los iqueños como la “Tierra de Sol”.

Modesto trabaja aproximadamente 10 horas al día, tiempo en el que atiende a un promedio de 2 clientes por día, debido a que este tipo de negocio demanda mucho tiempo en la reparación de la fibra de vidrio. Él es el único que brinda este tipo de servicio en la zona en donde trabaja, lo que le permite no tener competencia y a su vez generar buenos ingresos. Modesto nos comentó que aprendió sobre este negocio como ayudante de una persona que se dedicaba a esto, cuando él aprendió la realización de las reparaciones decidió ir en busca de nuevas oportunidades y fue así como abrió su propio negocio. Y esto no es todo, él también trabaja en una bodega porque como se sabe un ingreso extra siempre es bueno.

Él ha tenido la idea de  comprar algunas autopartes de autos, carcasas, entre otros, lo que le permitirán repararlas y vendérselas a sus clientes, debido a que es esta época del año donde más se demanda su producto. Con las ganancias que obtenga desea reinvertirlas y así tener mucha más variedad de productos, lo que le permitirá cumplir su gran sueño, ser dueño de una vida tranquila y feliz.
texts.en:
Modesto is a man who, together with his wife, has three children. In order to advance his family they both work; while she works at a large farm, Modesto repairs fiberglass on automobiles. Currently he and his family live in the city of Ica, which is known for agricultural exportation of asparagus and artichokes to all parts of the world; "Iquenos" (residents of Ica) call the region the "land of sun."

Modesto works approximately ten hours a day, during which he assists an average of two clients, since this type of work requires a lot of time to repair fiberglass. He is the only person that offers this kind of service in the region where he works, which gives him freedom from competition - which in turn generates a good income. Modesto told us that he learned this trade as an assistant to a person who also worked in this field. When he learned how to do the repairs, he decided to go and search for new opportunities and this was how he came to open his own business. And this isn't all - he also works at a grocery store, because we all know that an extra income is always good. 

He has had the idea of buying some spare parts for cars, automotive body parts, among other things, which will allow him to repair and sell them to his customers. This is the time of year when his products are in higher demand. With the profits he earns he wants to reinvest and so have more variety in products, so that he can reach his great dream: to have a peaceful and happy life.

loans.use: to buy automotive parts and body parts, among other things.

loans.name: Edwin

texts.es:
Edwin vive en la ciudad de pisco, ciudad que se caracteriza por Su cercanía a la Reserva Nacional de Paracas convierte a la ciudad de Pisco en un punto de partida para expediciones tanto a la Reserva como a su litoral, en el que destacan las Islas Ballestas; tiene 27 años y desde joven conoce lo que es ganarse el pan con el sudor de la frente. Edwin es muy trabajador,  anteriormente trabajaba como taxista en un vehículo alquilado, con lo cual gracias a su esfuerzo y dedicadion logro ahorrar para iniciar su negocio de venta de abarrotes en su bodega, el es muy amable con los clientes, por ello el cree que que le va bien en su negocio.

Edwin está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar mas mercadería para su negocio (arroz, azúcar, fideo, menestras, entre otros), lo que le permitirá tener mayores ingresos y mejorar su calidad de vida, así seguirá luchando día a día para cumplir su más grande sueño:” Comprarse un auto para trabajar por las noches y tener otro ingreso”.
texts.en:
Edwin lives in Pisco, a city that is characterized by its proximity to the Paracas National Reserve. Pisco has become the starting point for expeditions to the Reserve and the coast, with the Ballestas Islands as its highlight.

Edwin is 27 years old and since his childhood has learned what it means to earn his daily bread by the sweat of his brow. He is a hard-working man. Previously he worked as a taxi driver in a rented vehicle, and thanks to his effort and dedication he managed to save enough money to open a grocery store at home. He is very friendly to his customers, which he believes is the reason for his success in business.

Edwin is very grateful to Kiva lenders, because it was their support that enabled him to buy more goods for his store (rice, sugar, noodles, stews and others) and thus earn more money and improve his quality of life. He will continue his daily struggle to fulfill his greatest dream: "to buy a car to work at night and have another income."

loans.use: to buy groceries (rice, sugar, noodles and others).

loans.name: Jessica Elena

texts.es:
Jessica es una joven madre de 27 años de edad, su pequeño hijo tiene 8 años de edad y lo ama muchísimo por ello lucha todos los días para darle una mejor calidad de vida y verlos feliz, ambos viven en la ciudad de Nazca, es una ciudad peruana ubicada en la región centro-sur del Perú, Nazca es una ciudad muy activa, debido a la afluencia de turistas que visitan a diario las milenarias Líneas de Nazca, y también por el desarrollo en auge minero, agrícola y comercial de la zona, que la están convirtiendo en unas de las ciudades más cosmopolitas del sur peruano, como buena peruana a Jessica le gusta mucho la comida típica de nuestro país, por ello uno de sus platos favoritos es el “Seco con frejoles”.

Con mucho esfuerzo y ahorro Jessica logro tener su negocio de venta de artículos para el hogar (tapers, vasos, jarras, entre otros), le dedica a su trabajo alrededor de 10 horas diarias y puede atender hasta 10 clientes al día, ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy dedicada a su trabajo y atiende de manera amable a sus clientes.

Jessica está muy agradecida con los prestatarios kiva ya que gracias al apoyo que le han brindado ella podrá comprar mercadería de campaña escolar(loncheras, mochilas, útiles escolares) para incrementar su negocio, así mejorar sus ingresos y podrá seguir luchando para cumplir su más grande sueño:” Tener su propio local”.
texts.en:
Jessica is a young 27-year old mother. She loves her 8-year old son and fights every day to give him a better life and see him happy. They live in the city of Nazca in south-central Peru. Nazca is a bustling city due to the affluence of the tourists who come daily to visit the ancient Nazca Lines. The city has become one of the most cosmopolitan areas in Southern Peru due to the developing mining, agricultural, and commercial sectors. Like any good Peruvian  Jessica likes traditional Peruvian food, and names Seco con frejoles, a lamb and bean dish in green sauce, as one of her favorites.

With hard work and savings Jessica has managed to start her own business selling household goods (glasses, containers, and other products). She works around 10 hours a day and sees up to 10 clients a day. She believes her business is going well because she is dedicated and is kind to her clients.

Jessica is thankful for those who support her loan via Kiva because due to their support she has been able to buy products for the back-to-school season (lunch boxes, backpacks, school supplies) to grow her business and increase her income. Her dream is to own her own store.

loans.use: purchase merchandise (lunchboxes, classes, backpacks)

loans.name: Delia Marleni

texts.en:
Delia has been a client of Asociación Arariwa for about seven years. At this time, she is one of 14 members of the village bank “Los Alamos de la Estacion” located in the Andean highlands of Urcos, Cusco. Delia is 37 years old and is raising her 2-year-old with her partner. Delia makes a living by selling clothing to her neighbors. Delia visits her neighbors’ houses and takes orders, then travels to a neighboring city such as Cusco in order to fulfill her neighbors’ requests.

Delia is requesting a loan in order to pay for the advance purchase of clothing, as well as to support her partner’s construction business. Delia typically has to outlay some capital in order to buy the clothing, then wait for her customers’ payment. Occasionally, her customers delay in paying her back, or require several installments to pay for their order. Additionally, Delia’s partner runs a construction business, and requires working capital in order to pay construction workers.

Delia is pleased to receive a loan and said she is excited about the idea of one day having her own storefront in the main plaza.

loans.use: to pay for the advance purchase of clothing, as well as to support her partner’s construction business

loans.name: Leonor Yolanda

texts.en:
Leonor, a long-time client of Asociación Arariwa, continues to invest in improving her home baking business. She is 50 years old and has three children with her husband. Two of her children are living independently, and her youngest is 12 years old. 

Leonor bakes cakes, pies, and pastries made to order for special occasions including weddings, quinceañeras (a Latin American custom celebrated on a girl’s 15th birthday), baptisms, and birthdays. She also decorates the cakes herself, and offers designs ranging from elegant to playful (e.g., popular cartoon characters for children’s cakes). She does not have an oven at home, so she rents time at the large bread oven at one of the bakeries in town. Leonor has developed her business over the last 25 years by attending baking classes as well as learning from cookbooks, activities which were partially financed by previous loans.

Leonor is requesting a new loan in order to improve her house. She needs to buy materials such as cement, iron, and rock. Among her home improvements, she hopes to create a better space for baking, as well as a storefront to run a small café where she can display her confections.

Leonor is one of 14 members of the village bank “Los Alamos de la Estacion” located in the Andean highlands of Urcos, Cusco.

loans.use: to purchase home improvement materials such as cement, iron, and stones

loans.name: Alvaro Carrillo Group

texts.es:
Este  grupo se llama Alvaro Carillo y está conformado por trece integrantes  todas mujeres trabajadoras con diferentes negocios pero con los mismos sueños ya que todas desean mejorar sus negocios y su calidad de vida.
Una de las integrantes es la señora Catalina  de treinta y seis años de edad es madre soltera tiene la cantidad de dos hijos una niña y un niño.
Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa  para dama, caballero y niños también vende lo que son juguetes y accesorios para dama.
Ella nos cuenta que  le gusta mucho su negocio ya que le deja buenas ganancias y está en su casa y además  puede estar cerca de sus hijos.
Pidió el préstamo para la compra de más ropa y más juguetes  y artículos para dama ya que todo le deja buenas ganancias.
Las otras integrantes del grupo son: 
Antonina Florencia- se dedica a la venta de ropa.
Epifanía- se dedica a la venta de comida.
Feliza Antonina- se dedica a la venta de quesos.
Criselda Guadalupe-se dedica a la venta de agua.
Minerva- se dedica a la venta de antojitos mexicanos.
Juana Marisol  – se dedica a la venta de perfumes.
Ambrocia Eutiquia- se dedica a la venta de refrescos.
Vicenta- se dedica a la venta de mercancía de abarrotes.
Araceli- se dedica a la venta de costuras.
Esperanza- se dedica a la venta de ropa.
Zita Anastacia- se dedica a la venta de ropa.
Reinalda Gisela- se dedica a la venta de  bisutera. 

Le dan las gracias a fundación por todo el apoyo que les ha dado por salir adelante y triunfar en la vida.

loans.use: to purchase clothing for selling.

loans.name: Christopher

texts.en: Christopher used the previous loan to buy a motorcycle for his transport business. In his business, he faces hardships due to seasonal weather and difficulty in finding customers. His dream is to educate his children and to diversify the business. Christopher needs this loan to purchase a new motorcycle.

loans.use: to purchase a new motorcycle

loans.name: Anita

texts.en: Anita is one of 14 members of the village bank “Los Alamos de la Estacion” located in the Andean highlands of Urcos, Cusco. She is 54 years old and lives with her 34-year-old son. Anita has been running a small stand selling mate (a local herbal tea), maná (a Peruvian pancake made from maize), and soft drinks for about ten years. Anita purchases the food and beverages at wholesale and then sells them at retail. She is requesting a loan in order to purchase more mana, as well as a toaster so that she can serve warm mana to clients seeking respite from the cold weather. Anita dreams of one day owning a large store that sells mana.

loans.use: to purchase maná (Peruvian pancakes made from maize) and a toaster

loans.name: Enma Patricia

texts.es:
Enma Patricia tiene 29 años es casada vive con el esposo y con los hijos tiene 4 hijos de 9, 7, 6 y 1 Vive en Montalvo Provincia de Los Ríos. 

La ventanilla se llama PITA se encuentra ubicada En el Recinto San Pablo de Pita perteneciente al Canton Caluma a 45 minutos de Montalvo esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas a mantener los cultivos de naranja, guineo, orito, cacao y café. 


Enma se dedica a cuidar las plantaciones de cacao, guineo y naranja ya que estos productos son de ciclo largo, las compras las realiza en Comercial San Rafael en Caluma y las vende en Montalvo. 

El credito lo solicita para la compra de insumos como: abonos, urea, podas, limpieza del terreno de las malas hiervas y evitar enfermedades en los cultivos. El credito le ayudado a incrementar la calidad de los productos y evitar pérdidas en los cultivos. El sueño de Enma es comprar un carro, obtener mas productos y mayor produccion.

Le gusta ser una persona buena, tranquila y responsable en su trabajo.
texts.en: Enma Patricia is 29 years old, married and lives with her husband and their four children, ages 9, 7, 6 and 1, in Montalvo, province of Los Ríos. The PITA "ventanilla" is located in the San Pablo de Pita neighborhood in the town of Caluma, 45 minutes from Montalvo. This ventanilla is dedicated to agricultural work and maintaining crops of oranges, bananas, cocoa and coffee. Enma makes a living raising cocoa, bananas and orange on long cycles. She buys her supplies at the San Rafael market in Caluma and sells the products in Montalvo. She is requesting the loan to purchase supplies like fertilizers, urea, pruners and to clear her land from weeds and plant disease. The loan will help her improve the quality of her products and avoid crop losses. Her dream is to purchase a car, get more products and expand her production. She likes to be a good, calm and responsible person in her work.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers, urea and pruners, and rid the land of weeds and plant disease.

loans.name: Justo

texts.es:
Justo tiene 36 años de edad, es casado y tiene 2 hijos, tiene casa propia en la que vive junto a su familia la cual esta ubicada en el Pueblo Joven “La Matanza” perteneciente a la provincia de Morropón en Piura, es un pueblo grande donde es la agricultura y la comercialización de ganado su principal fuente de sustento.

Justo se dedica a la agricultura y ganadería a la vez, tiene plantaciones de limón, el cual cosecha semanalmente y sale a ofrecerlos por los mercados del su pueblo, su esposa es quien ayuda con la crianza de animales menores como ovinos, cerdos, y aves de corral, los dos trabajan arduamente con el fin de mejorar su calidad de vida, ah mencionadas actividades ya se están dedicando un aproximado de 5 años, en los cuales se ha hecho conocidos y ya tienen sus clientes fijos.

Justo quiere seguir progresando y ahora desea comprar fertilizantes para los sembrios de su fríjol, por el motivo que esta solicitando un crédito en Edpyme Alternativa por un monto de 1008 Nuevos Soles los cuales invertirá en lo planeado por él para generarse mayores ingresos, los cuales ayudaran no solo a mejorar su calidad de vida si no que también a darles una mejor educación a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Justo is 36 years old and is married with two children. He lives with his family in the town of La Matanza that is part of the province Morropon in Piura. It is a large town where agriculture and cattle ranching are the major industries.

Justo works both raising crops and livestock. He has a lime orchard, which he harvests from every week to sell to markets in town. His wife helps him raising and caring for animals like sheep, pigs, and poultry. They both work arduously with the goal of improving their quality of life. They have been working in this business for approximately five years, during which time they have developed a reputation and earned steady clients.

Justo wants to continue growing and now hopes to buy fertilizers for his bean plants. He has applied for a loan from Edpyme Alternativa for 1008 new soles which will be used to generate a higher income. This will improve his quality of life and allow him to provide a better education for his children.

loans.use: purchase fertilizer

loans.name: Nilda

texts.es:
Nilda es una mujer de 35 años que está a cargo de sus dos pequeños y amados hijos, el mayor de 15 y el menor de apenas 4 añitos, lamentablemente se separo de su esposo hace 5 años debido a algunas dificultades, es desde ese momento que Nilda decide ponerle mucho más esfuerzo al trabajo y darles lo mejor a sus pequeños.
Nilda disfruta mucho su tiempo haciéndole chompitas a sus pequeños, ya que uno de sus pasatiempos es ese, tejer, ella y su pequeña familia viven en la ciudad de Pisco, caracterizada por el candelabro, el cual se puede observar desde las preciosas islas ballestas, lugar muy concurrido por turistas, ubicado en el distrito de Paracas.
