Thanks to the Kiva credit, she will add to her working capital and buy a large quantity of bananas in order to prepare many liters of banana beer for sale, so as to increase her earnings. Her business revenues will allow her to pay for household [expenses] and to buy goats, chickens and a large quantity of bananas.

loans.use: tp buy a large quantity of bananas in order to prepare many liters of banana beer for sale, so as to increase her earnings.

loans.name: Adjélé

texts.fr:
Adjélé est une femme âgée de 26 ans. Elle est divorcée et a un enfant de 7 ans qui va à l’école.
Adjélé travaille comme revendeuse depuis 2002. Elle vend des poissons fumés pour tous clients au marché. Elle achète les produits à Lomé. Elle travaille avec sa mère. Au moment, sa difficulté principale est de ne pouvoir pas satisfaire toutes les demandes.
Adjélé a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des poissons. Elle veut réinvestir dans l’activité.
Dans les prochaines années, Adjélé voudrait ouvrir un dépôt de poissons. Elle dit qu’avec les profits, elle prévoit d’améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en:
Adjélé is a 26-year old woman. She is divorced and has a 7-year old child who goes to school. 

Adjélé has been working as a vendor since 2002. She sells smoked fish to the general public at the local market. She stocks up in Lomé. She works together with her mother. At present, her main challenge is being unable to meet demand. Adjélé has requested her first loan from WAGES in order to buy fish. She would like to reinvest in her business.

In the years to come, she would like to sell fish wholesale. She says that she  envisages improving the life conditions of her family thanks to the profits.

loans.use: to buy fish

loans.name: Kebura Group

texts.fr:
Viola fait partie du groupe Kebura, elle habite à Gitega. Elle est âgée de 40 ans et est mariée à François, vendeur de chèvres. Ensemble, ils 7 ont enfants âgés de 5 à 25 ans, deux enfants étudient à l'école primaire. 

Elle est commerçante de chèvres et de bière de banane depuis 12ans. 

Elle est à son huitième  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle  va  augmenter son capital et acheter une grande quantité de  régimes de bananes pour préparer beaucoup de litres de bière de banane, à revendre ,pour gagner plus. 
Les gains du crédit lui permettront d’acheter  d’autres lopins de terre pour  en avoir en suffisance.
texts.en:
Viola is part of the Kebura group and lives in the town of Gitega. She is 40 years old and married to François, a goat seller. Together the couple have 7 children aged between 5 and 25 years, 2 of whom go to primary school.

Viola has been selling goats and banana beer for 12 years. She is on her 8th loan cycle with Turame. With her Kiva-sponsored loan increasing her capital, she will buy a large number of bunches of bananas with which to make many litres of banana beer for resale, so that she can increase her earnings. The profits will allow her to buy more plots of land, so that she has enough of it.

loans.use: to buy a large amount of bunches of bananas with which to make banana beer for resale.

loans.name: Kadiamor Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité est créé le23 Mars 2001. Il  est  constitué de 13 femmes qui habitent le même quartier. Leur activité principale est le petit commerce.
Madame Khady qui est à gauche de la photo levant la main est responsable de groupe. Elle est âgée de 37 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 08 enfants.
Elle s’active dans la vente de jus de citron qu'elle envoi à Dakar. Elle a une bonne expérience dans ce domaine d’activité, qu’elle pratique depuis plusieurs années.
Ce prêt lui permettra de renforcer son capital et de mieux développer  ses activités.
Les profits lui permettront d’améliorer les conditions de vie de la famille (santé, nourriture, habillement etc.…) et d’augmenter ses épargnes.
texts.en:
The solidarity group was founded on 23 March 2001. The group consists of 13 women who all live in the same district. They are primarily involved in small business activities.
Madame Khady who is raising her hand on the left-hand side of the photo is the leader of the group. She is 37 years old. She is married and has 08 children. 
She makes a living through trading lemon juice that she sends to Dakar. She has a good deal of experience in this sector and has been working in this field for several years.
This loan will allow her to strengthen her capital and to expand her business.
The profits will enable her to improve the living conditions of her family (health, food, clothing, etc.) and increase her savings.

loans.use: To buy lemon juice for resale

loans.name: Tujimbere Group

texts.fr:
Cécile fait partie du groupe Tujimbere.  Elle habite à Gitega, elle a 26 ans. Elle est mariée à Jean Claude, commerçant de bananes. Ensemble ils ont 4 enfants, dont un seul étudie. 

Elle est  commerçante de vin de banane depuis 4ans.

Elle est à son quatrième  crédit  à Turame.  Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle  va  augmenter son capital en  achetant une grande quantité de bananes pour la production de beaucoup de litres de vin de banane, à revendre, pour gagner plus.

Avec les bénéfices, elle pourra acheter une terrain cultivable et entreprendre l’élevage.
texts.en:
Cécile is part of the Tujimbere group. She lives in Gitega and is 26 years old. She is married to Jean Claude, a banana seller. The couple have 4 children together, only one of whom goes to school.

Cécile has been selling banana wine for 4 years. This will be her fourth loan from Turame. She will use the Kiva-sponsored loan that she obtains to buy a large quantity of bananas with which to make many litres of banana wine for resale, which will allow her to increase her earnings and capital. With her profits, she will be able to buy some farmland on which to start raising livestock.

loans.use: to buy a large quantity of bananas with which to make banana wine for resale.

loans.name: Bamtare De Pakour 01 Group

texts.fr:
Créé le 30 décembre 2008 à l’inauguration de son banc villageois, le groupe Bamtaré est composé de 10 femmes animées par un souci de développement. Ces dernières vivent dans un même village et ont comme activité principale le petit commerce.

Madame Diénabou (debout à l’extrême droite) est responsable de groupe. Elle est âgée de 43 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 04 enfants, elle est vendeuse de pâte d’arachide et de légumes dans sa localité activité qu’elle pratique depuis plusieurs années.

Avec ce nouveau crédit, elle compte acheter de la pâte d'arachide et des légumes pour la revente.

Les bénéfices tirés de son activité lui permettront de soutenir son mari dans les charges familiales.
texts.en: Created on December 30, 2008 at the inauguration of the local "banc  villageois" to which it belongs,  the Bamtaré group is composed of 10 women driven to expand their businesses. The group members live in the same village and primarily work as vendors. Mrs. Diénabou  (standing on the far right) is the group’s leader. She is 43 years old. She is married and the mother of four.  She sells peanut paste and vegetable in her neighborhood. She has been doing this work for a number of years. With this loan, she plans to buy peanut paste and vegetables for resale. The revenues from this business will allow her to help her husband support the family.

loans.use: to buy peanut paste and vegetables for resale

loans.name: Yakaar Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité est créé le 23 Mars 2001. Il  est  constitué de 11 femmes qui habitent le même quartier. Leur activité principale est le petit commerce.
Madame Satou qui est à gauche de la photo levant la main est responsable de groupe. Elle est âgée de 42 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 07 enfants. Elle a aussi en sa charge 02 autres enfants confié par ses parents.
Elle s’active dans la vente de légumes et de patte d'arachide. Elle a une bonne expérience dans ce domaine d’activité, qu’elle pratique depuis plusieurs années.
Ce prêt lui permettra de renforcer son capital et de mieux développer  ses activités.
Les profits lui permettront d’améliorer les conditions de vie de la famille (santé, nourriture, habillement etc.…) et d’augmenter ses épargnes.
texts.en:
This solidarity group was created on March 23, 2001.  It is made up of 11 women who live in the same neighborhood.  They are mainly involved in small businesses. 
Mrs. Satou, to the left of the photo with her hand raised, is the leader of the group.  She is 42 years old.  She is married and the mother of seven children.  She also has two other children whose parents left them in her care. 
She sells vegetables and peanut butter.  She has a lot of experience with this type of business because she has been at it for several years. 
This loan will allow her to build up her working capital and to develop her business.
Her profits will allow her to improve living conditions for her family (healthcare, food, clothing, etc.) and to add to her savings.

loans.use: to buy vegetables and peanut butter.

loans.name: Beug Bamba Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité est créé le 23 Mars 2001. Il  est  constitué de 12 femmes qui habitent le même quartier. Leur activité principale est le petit commerce.
Madame Marième qui est à gauche de la photo levant la main est responsable de groupe. Elle est âgée de 62 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 03 enfants.
Elle s’active dans la vente de légumes. Elle a une bonne expérience dans ce domaine d’activité, qu’elle pratique depuis plusieurs années.
Ce prêt lui permettra de renforcer son capital et de mieux développer  ses activités.
Les profits lui permettront d’améliorer les conditions de vie de la famille (santé, nourriture, habillement etc.…) et d’augmenter ses épargnes.
texts.en:
This solidarity group was created on the 23rd of March, 2001. It is made up of 12 women who live in the same area. They are principally small retailers.

Marième, on the left of the picture, raising her hand, is the group's leader. She is 62 years old, married and mother to 3 children. She is an experienced vegetable seller, who has been in this line of work for many years. This loan will enable her to strengthen her capital and better develop her business activities. The profits will allow her to improve her family's living conditions (health, food, clothing, etc.) and to increase her savings.

loans.use: to buy vegetables for resale.

loans.name: Nafore De Pakour01 Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe Naforé a été créé le 30 décembre 2008 à l’inauguration de son banc villageois. Ces femmes sont très dévouées dans leurs activités. Elle sont au nombre de 12, elles habitent toutes le même village avec comme activité principale est le petit commerce.

Madame Souboum (debout à l’extrême droite) est responsable de groupe. Elle est âgée de 55 ans. Elle est mariée, elle a en charge  02 de ses enfants et un petit fils. 

Vendeuse de divers produits alimentaires : thé, sucre... principalement. Activité qu’elle maîtrise très bien pour l’avoir pratiquée pendant plusieurs années.

Ce prêt lui permettra de mieux gérer son activité par l’achat de thé et sucre en quantité pour la revente.

Les bénéfices lui permettront d’améliorer la nourriture et une meilleure prise en charge sanitaire de sa famille.
texts.en:
The Naforé group was created on the 30th of December, 2008, the inauguration date of the "banc villageois". These women are all very devoted to their businesses. There are 12 members, all living in the same village and all principally small retailers.

Souboum (standing, far right) is the group's leader. She is 55 years old, married and is taking care of 2 dependent children and one grandson. She sells various food products (mainly tea and sugar). She has been in this line of work for many years and is very knowledgeable about it. This loan will enable her to better manage her business by buying large quantities of tea and sugar for resale. The profits will allow her to improve the food and health care of her family.

loans.use: to buy tea and sugar in large amounts for resale.

loans.name: Kambeng 02 De Pakour1 Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe kambeng 02 de pakour 01 a été créé le 30 décembre 2008 à l’inauguration du banc villageois. Il compte 14 femmes qui habitent le même village et ont l’habitude de travailler ensemble. Leur activité principale est le petit commerce.

Madame Aissatou (debout à l’extrême droite), est responsable de groupe. Elle est mariée et mère de six enfants, âgée de 42 ans elle prend aussi en charge trois de ses parents. 

Elle est vendeuse de sucre, de thé et divers autres produits alimentaires. Elle a une bonne expérience de cette activité pour l’avoir pratiqué depuis des années.

Avec son nouveau crédit, elle compte acheter du sucre et thé pour la revente.

Les bénéfices générés, elle prévoit de donner à sa famille une meilleure condition de vie.
texts.en:
The Kambeng 02 De Pakour 01 group was created on the 30th December 2008 at the inauguration of the banc villageois (village bank).It is made up of 14 women who live in the same village and usually work together. Their main activity is small businesses.

Madame Aissatou (standing on the far right) is the leader of the group. She is married with six children, she is 42 years old, and she also cares for three relatives.

She sells sugar, tea and various other foodstuffs .She has much experience as she has been in the business for many years.

With her new loan, she plans to buy sugar and tea for resale. 

With the profits, she intends to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy sugar and tea for resale.

loans.name: Bokk Ndeye Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité est créé le 23 Mars 2001. Il  est  constitué de 07 femmes qui habitent le même quartier. Leur activité principale est le petit commerce.
Madame Mame qui est à gauche de la photo levant la main est responsable de groupe. Elle est âgée de 36 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 03 enfants. 
Elle s’active dans la vente de légumes. Elle a une bonne expérience dans ce domaine d’activité, qu’elle pratique depuis plusieurs années.
Ce prêt lui permettra de renforcer son capital et de mieux développer  ses activités.
Les profits lui permettront d’améliorer les conditions de vie de la famille (santé, nourriture, habillement etc.…) et d’augmenter ses épargnes.
texts.en:
This solidarity group was created on March 23, 2001. It is made up of seven women who live in the same neighborhood. Their main business activity is small-scale retail trade.

Mame, on the left side of the photograph with her hand raised, is the group leader. She is 36 years old. She is married and mother of three children. She sells vegetables. She has a lot of experience in this business, which she has been involved in for several years. This loan will allow her to build up her capital and better develop her business.

The profits will allow her to improve the living conditions of her family (health, food, clothing, etc.) and increase her savings.

loans.use: to buy vegetables intended for resale

loans.name: Angelica

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “HACIA EL TRIUNFO”; Este banco está ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac, provincia de Cusco, Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra: Angelica, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de elaboracion de todo tipo de sabores de mermeladas como fresa,durazno,sauco entre otros para luego y venderlos a sus clientes que le solicitan como familiares y amistades,a la vez la socia trabaja en una institucion publica siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante asu familia,la socia es una persona bien alegre y responsable.

La socia solicita el prestamo para la compra de insumos para la elaboracion de mermeladas como azucar,y frutas.


La socia está feliz con el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank "HACIA EL TRIUNFO” [Towards Triumph]; This bank is located in the district of Huanchac, in the province of Cusco, department of Cusco.

The member is Angelica. She alternates her daily activities with her jam making business. She makes all sorts of jams such as strawberry and elderberry among others, which she later sells to her customers who request her products, such as family members and friends. She also works in a public institution, which allows her to get her family ahead. She is a happy and responsible person.

The member requests a loan to buy supplies to make jams, such as sugar and fruit.

The member is happy with the loan that has been provided and she is committed to paying her quotas in the established period.

loans.use: to buy supplies to make jams, such as sugar and fruit.

loans.name: Weltare De Badion 01 Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe Weltaré de Badion 01 est né le 15 décembre 2009. Il compte en son sein 24 femmes qui habitent le même village. Elles  sont très actives dans la transformation des produits locaux particulièrement de la patte d’arachide et autres céréales (mil et maïs)

Madame Ansara (assise à  l’extrême gauche) est responsable de groupe. Elle est mariée et mère de cinq enfants. Agée de 54 ans 
Elle est très active et mène depuis plusieurs années des activités de transformation des produits locaux (mil, maïs etc.) surtout la patte d’arachide.

Avec ce prêt elle compte acheter des céréales en quantité pour la transformation et la vente.

Les bénéfices lui permettront de soutenir son mari dans les charges familiales.
texts.en:
The Weltaré de Badion 01 group was created on December 15, 2009. It is made up of 24 women who live in the same village. They are very active in the production of local products, in particular peanut butter and other cereals (millet and corn).

Ansara (seated, on the far left) is the group leader. She is married and mother of five children. At 54 years old, she is very active and has been working in the production of local products (millet, corn, etc.), especially peanut butter, for several years now.

With this loan, she plans to buy cereals in bulk to be transformed and sold.

The profits will allow her to support her husband in covering the family's expenses.

loans.use: to buy cereals in bulk to be transformed and sold

loans.name: Nina

texts.en: Nina is from the village of Aregnadem in the Shirak region of Armenia. She is happily married with three wonderful children: a twenty-year-old daughter and two sons (ages twenty-three and twenty-four). Nina has a high school education and has been farming for the past fifteen years. She also supports her relatives living in the city with produce grown on the family farm. Nina wants a loan to purchase calves and fertilizer. She expects the family income to increase by twenty-five percent with this investment. She keeps her business debt low, at less than twenty percent of her equity investment. Nina enjoys living in Aregnadem.

loans.use: to purchase calves.

loans.name: Fass Diom Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe a été créé le 15 décembre 2008.IL est composé de 12 femmes issues du même quartier, elles se sont unies par affinité, par voisinage et par amitié, elles ont d'excellentes relations 
Leur activité principale est le petit commerce.

MAREME (debout à droite sur la photo) est responsable du groupe. Elle est âgée de 46 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 08 enfants. Elle a aussi la charge d'une nièce et d'un petit fils. 

Elle fait un petit commerce de couscous, de l'embouche ovine, et de l'élevage de volaille. Elle pratique cette activité depuis plus de 15 ans.

Son prêt va lui permettre d'acheter du mil qu'elle va transformer en couscous pour revendre. Elle va également acheter des poulets,et au moins un mouton destinés à la revente. 

Son objectif est d'aider son mari dans la gestion de la famille.
texts.en:
This group was created on December 15, 2008. It comprises fifteen women from the same district. They are united by affinity, community, and friendship. They have excellent relations. Their main work involves small-scale commerce.

MAREME (standing at the right in the photo) is the group’s official. She is 46 years old, married, and the mother of eight children. She also has a niece and a grandson to support. 

She has a small business selling couscous and raising sheep and poultry. She has been working at this business for over fifteen years. 

Her loan is going to enable her to buy some millet that she will process into couscous for resale. She is also going to buy some chickens and at least one head of sheep for resale. 

Her goal is to help her husband in managing the family.

loans.use: to buy millet, chickens, and sheep

loans.name: Jàppo Ligguèy Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe a été créé le 28 juin 2010.IL est composé de 11 femmes issues du même quartier. leur activité principale est le petit commerce. 

Seynabou (debout à droite sur la photo) est responsable du groupe. Elle est âgée de 43 ans. Elle est mariée et et mère de 05 enfants elle a aussi la charge d'une nièce. 

Elle fait du commerce de couscous et de l'embouche ovine. Elle pratique cette activité depuis 10ans. 

Son prêt va lui permettre d'acheter du mil qu'elle transformera en couscous pour revendre. Elle va aussi acheter des moutons pour développer son activité d'embouche.

Son objectif est de soutenir son mari dans la prise en charge de la famille.
texts.en:
This group was established on June 28, 2010. It is made up of 11 women from the same neighborhood; their primary occupation is small business.

Seynabou (standing at right in the photo) is the group leader. She is 43 years old, married and the mother of five children - she is also responsible for a niece.

Her business is selling couscous and fattening sheep. She has been running this business for 10 years.

Her loan will allow her to purchase millet, which she will convert to couscous to be sold. She will also purchase sheep in order to expand her fattening business.

Seynabou's goal is to support her husband in taking care of the family.

loans.use: To purchase millet and sheep.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To purchase perfume and incense.

loans.name: Bokk Jom Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe BOKK JOM a été créé le 28 juin 2010.IL est composé de 09 femmes habitant le même quartier. Elles ont organisé leur groupe par affinité, par voisinage. La plupart des membres du groupe font le petit commerce. 

Anta (debout à droite sur la photo) est la responsable du groupe. Elle est âgée de 47 ans. Elle a en charge 06 enfants. 

Elle a comme activité principale le petit commerce de  légumes. Elle mène cette activité dans son quartier depuis plusieurs ans. 

Son prêt va lui permettre d'acheter des légumes en quantité plus importante pour mieux satisfaire sa clientèle et réaliser plus de revenus financiers. 

Son objectif est de pouvoir subvenir aux besoins de sa famille et de renforcer son épargne.
texts.en:
This group, BOKK JOM, was created on June 28, 2010. It comprises nine women living in the same district. They have organized their group by affinity and community. Most the group members have small businesses. 

Anta (standing at the right in the photo) is the group's official. She is 47 years old and has six children to support. 

Her main work is a small business selling vegetables. She has been in this business in her district for several years. 

Her loan is going to enable her to buy vegetables in greater quantities to satisfy her customers further and to make more revenues. 

Her goal is to be able to support her family and to bolster her savings.

loans.use: to buy vegetables

loans.name: Khassana Aidara Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe Khasana Aïdara a été créé le 28 juin 2010.IL est composé de 08 femmes issues du même quartier. Elles se sont organisées par affinité, par voisinage. Leur activité principale est le petit commerce. 

Ndèye (debout à droite sur la photo) est responsable du groupe. Elle est âgée de 56 ans. Elle a en charge 07 enfants. 

Elle a comme activité principale le petit commerce de fruits et légumes. En parallèle elle fait de l'embouche Ovine. Elle mène cette d'activité depuis 03 ans. 

Son prêt va lui permettre d'acheter la marchandise et un mouton pour la poursuite de ses activités et la satisfaction de sa clientèle. 

Son objectif est de pouvoir subvenir aux besoins de sa famille et de renforcer son épargne.
texts.en:
This group, Khasana Aïdara, was created on June 28, 2010. It comprises eight women from the same district. They are organized by affinity and community. Their main work involves small-scale commerce.

Ndèye (standing at the right in the photo) is the group's official. She is 56 years old and has seven children to support. 

Her main work is a small business selling fruits and vegetables. At the same time, she fattens sheep. She has been in this business for three years. 

Her loan is going to enable her to buy merchandise and a head of sheep to continue with her business and to satisfy her customers.

Her goal is to be able to support her family and to bolster her savings.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables and a sheep

loans.name: Sop Serigne Fallou Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe a été créé le 28 juin 2010.IL est composé de 12 femmes issues du même quartier. Elles se sont constituées par affinité, par voisinage et par amitié. Leur activité principale est le petit commerce.

Mariama (debout à droite sur la photo) est responsable du groupe. Elle est âgée de 37ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 06 enfants. 

Elle développe un petit commerce de couscous. Elle pratique cette activité depuis 11 ans. 

Son prêt va lui permettre d'acheter du mil qu'elle transforme en couscous qu'elle revend. 

Son objectif est de soutenir son mari dans la gestion de la famille.NB il y a un membre qui est la photo et n'a pris de prêt
texts.en:
This group was created on June 28, 2010. It comprises twelve women from the same district. They formed a group by affinity, community, and friendship. Their main work involves small-scale commerce.

Mariama (standing at the right in the photo) is the group's official. She is 37 years old, married, and the mother of six children. 

She is developing a small business involving couscous. She has been in this work for eleven years   

Her loan is going to enable her to buy millet, which she processes into couscous and resells. 

Her goal is to support her husband in managing the family. Note: There is a member in the photo who has not taken out a loan.

loans.use: to buy millet

loans.name: Tannaf 02 Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe Tanaff  02  a été créé le 13 décembre 2003  à l’inauguration de leur banc villageois. Il est composé de 09 femmes qui sont issues du même  quartier, très actives dans les activités de commerce.

Madame Sandji (assise à l’extrême droite) est responsable de groupe, elle est âgée de 49 ans. Elle est  mariée, elle prend en charge 02 de ses enfants et 04 autres proches parents.

Elle est vendeuse de crème glacée dans son quartier, activité qu’elle pratique depuis plus 05 ans.

Son nouveau crédit lui permettra d’acquérir un stock de pain de singe et de sucre pour la préparation des crèmes glacées.

Des bénéfices qu’elle obtient de son commerce, elle compte soutenir son mari dans la prise en charge des besoins familiaux.
texts.en: The group "Tanaff 02" was created on December 13, 2003 at the inauguration of their banc villageois. The group comprises nine women from the same district who are very active in commerce. Ms. Sandji (seated at the far right) is the group's official. She is 49 years old and married, and she takes care of two of her own children and four others from close relatives. She is a retailer of ice cream in her district. This is a business she has been in for over five years. Her new loan will enable her to acquire a stock of 'monkey bread' (the fruit of the baobab tree) and some sugar to make ice creams. Using the profits she obtains from her business, she intends to support her husband in meeting the needs of the family.

loans.use: to acquire a stock of 'monkey bread' and sugar to make ice creams

loans.name: Akuvi

texts.fr:
Akuvi est une femme âgée de 45 ans. Elle est mariée à un retraité.  Elle a 1 enfant. 
Akuvi est revendeuse depuis 2002. Elle vend des boissons et des produits d’alimentation générale pour tous clients dans sa boutique. Elle achète les produits à Lomé. Elle travaille seule. Au moment, sa difficulté principale est la rupture de stock.
Akuvi a requis son second crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des boissons et des produits d’alimentation générale. Elle veut réinvestir dans l’activité.
Dans les prochaines années, Akuvi voudrait agrandir la taille de son activité. Elle dit qu’avec les profits, elle prévoit de subvenir aux besoins de sa famille.
texts.en:
Akuvi is a 45-year-old woman who is married to a retiree. She has one child. Akuvi has been a retailer since 2002. She sells drinks and grocery items for all comers in her store. She buys her goods in Lomé, the capital of Togo. She works by herself. At the moment, her main difficulty is a shortage in inventory. 

Akuvi has requested her second WAGES loan to buy drinks and grocery items. She wants to reinvest in her business.

In the next few years, Akuvi would like to  expand the size of her business. She says that, using the profits, she plans to meet the needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy beverages and grocery items

loans.name: May

texts.en:
Farming is the main source of income for May's family. She is thankful because she is able to provide her family needs through her rice farming business. Her husband has been in charge of taking care of her rice field and it's been two years of sacrifices they have devoted to improve it. 

May still aims to improve the growth of crops to be able to gain greater profits. Nowadays, May is suffering from a shortage of capital due to her household expenditures and the high cost of basic necessities. In this situation, May is encouraged to borrow additional capital of PHP 27,000. This amount would really help her to purchase farm supplies such as fertilizer and insecticides and to pay for the labor cost of hired laborers. She hopes that she can make her farming business more profitable so that she can acquire a greater income for her family's needs.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and insecticides and to pay for labor costs

loans.name: Armen

texts.en: Armen is a 39-year-old farmer from Nor Sasnashen village. He lives with his wife and three children. Armen would like to develop his farm, which requires sufficient financial investments. Thus, he has applied for a loan. With the requested loan, Armen plans to purchase cattle. Development of cattle breeding will allow Armen to get additional income and use it to improve conditions in the household.

loans.use: to pay for cattle

location.town: Nor Sasnashen village of Aragatsotn region

loans.name: Arusyak

texts.en: Arusyak is a 48-year-old businesswoman from Yerevan. Arusyak runs a shop where she trades in men's clothing. Arusyak needs some financial investment to increase the variety of clothing she sells. This will allow Arusyak to meet the clients' demands and increase her sales. Arusyak hopes to get more income and invest it in further development of the business.

loans.use: to buy clothing to sell

loans.name: Ronald Alfonso

texts.es:
Ronald es un joven muy trabajador y entusiasta, tiene 22 maños de edad y vive en la ciudad de Ica; Ica es el único de la costa sur formado por planicies, también llamadas llanuras costeñas, puesto que la Cordillera de los Andes se levanta muy al interior. En Ica se encuentran extensos desiertos, como las Pampas de Lancha, las Pampas de Villacurí, en donde el calor es muy intenso, ofrece playas y aguas termales, variada fauna marina, museos de sitio y excelentes servicios de hoteles, asimismo convive junto a su pareja y juntos tienen un hijo de 3 años de edad al cual adora mucho y es su razón de vivir, su pareja lo apoya en todo, es su mano derecha y trabaja vendiendo ropa ; como buen peruano a Ronald le gusta la comida y uno de sus platillos favoritos es el  riquísimo “lomo Saltado”, solo pudo estudiar hasta el quinto grado de educación secundaria, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar Ingeniería Civil.

Ronald trabaja como chofer de mototaxi, le dedica a su trabajo alrededor de 14 horas diarias y puede atender hasta 50 clientes en el día, el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque se esfuerza mucho por realizarlo de buena manera, por ello brinda un buen servicio a sus clientes. 

Ronald está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias al apoyo que le han brindado podrá colocarle puertas y equiparla para tener mayor seguridad, así los clientes se sentirán mas cómodos y tendrán más confianzas en usar sus servicios, lo que le permitirá tener mayores ingresos y así poder cumplir su más grande sueño:”  Darle una buena profesión a su hijo y Tener otra mototaxi”.
texts.en:
Ronald is a hard working, enthusiastic young man. He is 22 years old and lives in the city of Ica. Ica is in the only coastal plains area on Peru's southern coast, where the Andes run farther inland. Around Ica there are vast deserts, like the Pampas de Lancha and Pampas de Villacurí, that experience intense heat, but there are also beaches, hot springs, varied marine plant-life, museums and excellent hotels.

Ronald lives with his partner and together they have a three year old son who he loves very much and is his reason to live. His partner supports him in everything, she is his right hand and works selling clothes. Like a good Peruvian, Ronald likes food and his favourite dish is the tasty "Lomo Saltado". He was only able to study up to fifth grade of secondary school but he would have liked to study Civil Engineering.

Ronald works as a rickshaw driver. He spends about 14 hours daily working and he can attend up to 50 customers in one day. He believes that his business is going well because he makes an effort to carry it out decently, and he offers a good service to his customers.

Ronald is very grateful to the Kiva lenders as thanks to their support he will be able to fit doors to his rickshaw and kit it out to have better security. This way his customers will feel more comfortable and will feel more confident about using his services. This will allow him to generate more income and so fulfil his biggest dream: "To give his son a good profession and to have another rickshaw".

loans.use: to buy doors and kit out his rickshaw.

loans.name: Sophal

texts.en:
Sophal (pictured above), age 30, is single. He lives with his sister on an island in the Mekong River about 15 kilometers from Phnom Penh City.

Sophal is s security guard. He is asking for a loan of $1,000 to repair the house where he lives and fill-in the land around his house because there are some small ponds he needs to fill in.

loans.use: To repair his house and fill-in the land around his house.

loans.name: Pacita

texts.en:
Pacita is 42 years old and married with two children. She has 25 years of experience selling meats such as pork and chicken in their market. The hours her business operates are from 6 am to 7 pm. Sometimes the business operates for a longer time, especially if it is market day.

Pacita has requested a loan of PHP 10,000 to purchase chicken and pork. She would also purchase additional goods for her store. With any profits from her businesses, she would like to satisfy her family's basic needs, improve their living situation and save for the future of her children.

loans.use: to purchase chicken and pork

loans.name: Wilma

texts.en:
Wilma is a very industrious woman. She operates two businesses (buy & sell of vegetables and a grocery store). She is 31 years old, married and blessed with three children.  For more than four years, she has been working with these businesses. She has improvefd their living situation.

With the desire to improve further, she is requesting a loan of 10,000 PHP in purchase products such as vegetables and grocery items. With the loan, she hopes to develop of her businesses and to save for the future of her children.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables and grocery items

loans.name: Santo Leandro

texts.es: Santo es un hombre de 46 años de edad y tiene muchas aspiraciones en los próximos años de prosperar su negocio de bazar, copiadora y ferretería su historia empezó cuando era empleado de una empresa y cuando de una empresa y cuando lo liquidaron puso su negocio hace 7 años, su trabajo lo hace con 2 hijos y su mama también le ayuda en el negocio, no tiene dificultades, está soltero, si tiene2 hijos, su sueño más importante es terminar la casa y agrandar su negocio. Por  eso quiere el préstamo para su negocio de bazar, copiadora y ferretería.
texts.en:
Santo is a 46 year old man, and he has great aspirations for his store, photocopying service and hardware store to prosper in the coming years. His story began when he was employed in a company and when he was laid off seven years ago he set up his business. 

He works with his two children and their mother also helps in the business. He doesn't have any problems. He is single, although he has two children. His biggest dream is to finish his house and to extend his business. This is why he wants a loan for his store, photocopying service and hardware store.

loans.use: to buy supplies for his store, photocopying service and hardware store.

loans.name: Perfecto Arturo

texts.es: Perfecto es un hombre de 64 años de edad y tiene muchas aspiraciones en los próximos años de prosperar su bazar y perfumería su historia empezó cuando la esposa le dio esa idea, su trabajo lo hace con sus hijos y desde las 6:30 hasta las 22:30, no tiene dificultades, es viudo, si tiene hijos son mayores de edad, su sueño más importante es mejorar la casa e incrementar el negocio. Por  eso quiere el préstamo para su negocio de bazar y perfumería.
texts.en:
Perfecto is a 64 year old man, and he has great aspirations for his store and perfume shop to prosper in the coming years. His story began when his wife gave him this idea. 

He works with his children from 6:30am until 22:30. He doesn't have any problems. He is a widower, and his children are adults. His biggest dream is to improve his house and to extend his business. This is why he wants a loan for his store and perfume shop.

loans.use: to buy a carp, chairs, plates and tables.

loans.name: Cecille

texts.en:
Cecille is 26 years old. She is engaged in selling dry goods such as slippers, shoes and doormats. She is married and blessed with one child. She makes her sales in the market and has three employees. Before, she did not want to get employees because of her low income. But she felt pity for these teenagers who stop after school, so to help them save for their education, she hired them. 

As of now, she is requesting a loan of PHP 25,000 to purchase additional goods to offer (such as slippers) in order to acquire a higher income and provide her employees' labor costs. She feels that this loan will help her increase her sales and give her family better living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase additional goods to sell

loans.name: Gracela

texts.en:
Gracela is 51 years of age, married and blessed with three children. She is engaged in selling leafy vegetables such as camote tops, but mostly she sells bananas. She sells her products in the market every market day (Thursday and Sunday). 

She has requested a loan of PHP 10,000 to buy additional vegetables to sell such as potatoes, squash and string beans. She hopes that her loan will help her to increase her income both for the needs of his family and to save enough funds for the improvement of their house that is usually destroyed by disastrous calamities.

loans.use: to buy additional vegetables to sell

loans.name: Omar

texts.en:
Omar is a hardworking man who is married to Cresencia. He is 56 years of age with five grown-up children. According to him, four of his children are studying while the other one is an OFW (Overseas Filipino Worker).

Omar did not finish his education due to the early death of his father. Another reason is that his family has a large household. Though he didn't continue his studies,  he is able to stand independently from his family. He got married in 1980 and started to raise hogs. By that time, Omar was encouraged to raise a corn crop and engage in the transportation business. With his dedication to improve their living conditions, he endures all the struggles in running his business. Nowadays, he is raising two sows and fattening seven. With the number of hogs he is raising, his budget is not sufficient because of the expensive price of the feed and vaccine for the hogs.The income generated from his farming and vulcanizing shop business was used for his children's education. So,Omar is in need of additional capital amounting to PHP 20,000, which will be used to buy stock feed for his livestock business.Through his additional capital,and continuous financial support by the lenders, he will be able to sustain their daily needs and make his business grow. In this way, Omar would save some for security purposes when he and his wife got weak.

loans.use: to buy feed for his livestock

loans.name: Merlita

texts.en: Merlita is 51 years old and married with five children. She sells green and yellow bananas. She has had this business for three years. She requests a loan of PHP 9,000 to buy bananas to sell. Merlita hopes to improve her business in order to achieve a better living in the future.

loans.use: to buy bananas to sell.

loans.name: Loida

texts.en: Loida is 41 years old and blessed with two children. She operates piggery business and trades fruits and vegetables. She is aspiring for some financial investment to grow her business. She is requesting a loan of PHP 9,000 to buy feed for her pigs and additional bananas and vegetables. With the help of this loan, she will increase sales and get more income. This is vital for her and her family because she will improve her household's condition and ensure higher living standards.

loans.use: to buy feed for her pigs, and additional bananas and vegetables

loans.name: Marites

texts.en:
Marites runs retail shop, which she sells candies, juices, and soft drinks. With her unending patience to sell every day, she provides a better living for her two children.  This has been a great help in improving their lifestyle.

She is requesting a loan of PHP 10,000 to purchase additional groceries such as biscuits, jellyace, and snack foods often bought by customers. This time, she will be able to invest in constructing their house.

loans.use: to purchase additional groceries such as biscuits, jellyace, and snack foods often bought by customers

loans.name: Reynaldo

texts.en:
Reynaldo works hard to fulfill his simple dream to provide for the needs of his family and send his children to school. He is happily married to Loida who is a business-minded person. The couple are blessed with two children. 

Reynaldo has run his livestock business for almost 20 years. By this time, he is raising five fattening hogs and one sow. As the head of the family, Reynaldo wants to provide a better way of life for his family. So, to obtain his goal, he is requesting financial support from lenders in the amount of PHP 20,000 to purchase hog feed for his livestock business. He knows that through his hog raising, he can provide for the daily school expenses of his two children and their basic necessities.

loans.use: to provide feed for his livestock

loans.name: Solidario Bethlehem Group

texts.es: Solidario Bethlehem: Este grupo está formado por doña María Ruth de 40 años de edad, tiene 3 hijos, y es madre soltera, se dedica a la venta de ropa típica nueva y usada además hace costura porque tiene una máquina para coser, desde hace 15 años, nos cuenta que necesita este crédito porque necesita comprar tela para hacer blusas blancas para la época escolar además puede hacer faldas, y necesita comprar alguna mercadería de ropa típica,esta solicitando este credito para la compra de telas para elavorar uniformes y compra de ropa tipica. también esta doña Liria Ester, quien tiene una venta de ropa típica nueva desde hace 5 años, nos cuenta que necesita el crédito porque necesita comprar cortes y blusas de uniformes porque hay gente que le compra ropa para uniformes, también esta doña Marta Alicia de 34 años quien tiene una tienda desde hace 7 años además vende leña de pino y encino nos cuenta que solicita este nuevo crédito porque necesita surtir su tienda ya que viene la época escolar y los niños pasan comprando para su refacción y ella necesita tener productos que le están pidiendo, además quiere comprar un poco de leña porque ya se le está terminando y le están ofreciendo dos camionadas de leña y se la están dejando a buen precio entonces ella tiene que aprovechar adquirirlo para cuando ya no haya, ella tenga almacenado
texts.en:
Bethlehem Solidarity Group: This group includes Ms. Ruth, who is 40 years old, has three children, and is a single mother. She sells new and used traditional clothing and also sews, since she has had a sewing machine for 15 years. She tells us that she needs this loan because she needs to buy fabric for making white blouses for the back-to-school season. She will also make skirts and needs to buy some merchandise (traditional clothing) too. She is requesting this loan to buy fabric for making uniforms and to buy traditional clothing.

There is also Ms. Liria Ester, who has been selling traditional clothing for five years. She tells us that she needs this loan because she needs to buy skirts and blouses for uniforms because there are people who buy uniforms from her.

There is also Ms. Marta Alicia, 34, who has run a store for seven years. She also sells pine and oak firewood. She tells us that she is requesting this new loan because she needs to stock up her store as the back-to-school season is approaching. Children pass through to make purchases and Marta Alicia needs to have the products they are requesting. In addition, she wants to buy a little firewood because she is running low and they are offering two truckloads of firewood at a good price, so she wants to take advantage and purchase some so that she has it stored away when there is none available.

loans.use: to buy fabric for sewing uniforms and to buy traditional clothing

loans.name: Nolito

texts.en:
Nolito has five children who all go to school. Most are at the highschool level of education. Nolito is striving to send his children to school through the college level of education. He wants to see his children became professionals someday.
Nolito is 49 years old and married. Nolito engages himself in planting and harvesting rice to make a living. He has been in this business since he was single. Now, he has already spent 18 years managing his farm.
Nolito is asking for a loan of PHP 25,000 to pay for other labor cost in farming and buy seeds. Nolito believes that through the loan and farming, he will attain his goals for his children.

loans.use: to pay for other labor cost in farming and buy seeds.

loans.name: Marites

texts.en:
Marites, aged 38, has operated a buying and selling business for almost three years. 

She often sells bananas in their market every day it is open. She also has a sari-sari store, but she is more focused on her trade business because it brings in a higher income, especially when it provides the necessities needed for her family.

In this regard, she is requesting a loan of PHP 8,000 to buy bananas and groceries. These activities enable her family to progress, especially with regard to maintaining the education of her two children. She will hopefully improve her living situation with her loan.

loans.use: to buy bananas and groceries

loans.name: Rosita

texts.en:
Rosita is 55 years old, married and a responsible mother of eight children, four of whom already have their own family. 

She has been selling vegetables and meat for over 18 years. Her harvested vegetables in her yards are mostly sold in the market and she uses the income to support her family’s needs, such as buying commodities and food.

She is requesting a loan of PHP 8,000 to buy seeds to plant in her yards, as well as vegetables and meat as additional goods to offer. She is looking forward to the purchased goods producing a positive result.

loans.use: to buy seeds to plant in her yards, as well as vegetables and meat as additional goods to offer

loans.name: Avelina

texts.en:
Avelina is 56 years old, widowed and lives with her two children. 

She established a store in her home as way of earning a living, when she is not be able to sell bananas in their market. Their primary source of income was selling bananas and she raised her children through this activity. 

She is requesting a loan of PHP 7,000 to buy bananas, snacks, eggs, biscuits and juices for her store, in order to increase her income and improve her service to her customers. She hopes for a rise in her expected income to secure their lives from poor living.

loans.use: to buy bananas, snacks, eggs, biscuits and juices for her store

loans.name: Abdulhakim

texts.ru: Абдулхаким добрый и трудолюбивый человек. Он женат и любящий отец четверых детей. Более 7 лет он занимается купле- продажей мужской одежды. Два раза в месяц приобретает товар на рынке «Корвон». Имеет много постоянных клиентов. Абдулхаким хотел бы получить займ в размере 6000 Сомони для покупки новых ассортиментов мужской  одежды. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Abdulhakim is a good and hardworking person. He is married and the loving father of four children. For more than seven years he has been buying and selling men's clothing. Twice a month, he gets goods from the "Korvon" market. He has many loyal customers. Abdulhakim would like to receive a loan of 6,000 somoni to buy a new assortment of men's clothing. He is relying upon your help and kindness.

loans.use: To buy new clothing to sell

loans.name: Mary Jane

texts.en:
Mary Jane is happy to see her hog raising business growing. She is married to Regie, who is a farmer within the local community where she lives. The couple are blessed with only one child. 

Mary Jane has been in the hog raising business for six years and she is currently raising three piglets and fattening three. 

She would like to raise them all until they reach their optimum growth but she does not have enough capital. So, Mary Jane is requesting a loan of PHP 15,000, which will be used to buy feed and vaccine for her raised hogs. She is hoping that she can feed them well to enable her to achieve a greater profit. 

Mary Jane would be glad if her request for a loan is approved.

loans.use: to buy feed and vaccine for her pigs

loans.name: Angelina

texts.en:
Angelina is 58 years old, married and is a responsible mother of seven children. 

She raised her children through selling bananas and operating a small sari-sari store. She started her business with her own resources and continues with her requested loan amount of PHP 10,000 to buy bananas and groceries. 

In the 20 years of operating this business, she has tried to improve their living situation. She is hoping that through her unending patience and hard work she will improve their living situation.

loans.use: to buy bananas and groceries

loans.name: Ofelia

texts.en:
Ofelia is 48 years old and has been married for 30 years. She’s the mother of five children and is a very hardworking woman. 

She sells vegetables and bananas in their barrio. She starts working very early and also finishes very early. She started the business with the small amount of savings she had and is requesting a loan of PHP 8,000 as additional working capital to buy bananas and vegetables. 

With the discipline she has, she knows that someday, she will be able to improve her business, which will help improve her income.

loans.use: to buy bananas and vegetables

loans.name: Buston

texts.ru: Бустон имеет большую дружную семью. Жена и семеро детей.  Более 17 лет он занимается предоставлением транспортных услуг. Он привозит строительные материалы такие как грунт, щебень, песок и другие материалы для хозяйственных нужд. Бустон хотел бы получить займ для покупки запасных частей для техники. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Buston has a large, tightly-knit family with a wife and seven children.  For more than 17 years he has provided transportation services.  He hauls building materials such as soil, crushed stone, sand, and other materials for home and garden needs.  Buston would like to take out a loan to buy spare parts for his equipment.  He is relying on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts

loans.name: Mairam

texts.ru: Майрам трудолюбивая и  добросовестная женщина. Она вдова и любящая мать троих детей. Её дети уже взрослые и помогают ей по домохозяйству. Более 12 лет она занимается купле продажей тканей. Начала свой бизнес в этой сфере бизнеса. Она торгует на местном рынке. В бизнесе помогает невестка. Майрам хотела бы получить займ в размере 10000 Сомони для покупки весенних тканей. Она надеется на вашу поддержку и доброту.
texts.en: Mairam is a hard-working and conscientious woman.  She is a widow and the loving mother of three children.  They are already adults and help her with the housework.   For more than 12 years she has had a business of selling fabrics at the local market.  Her daughter-in-law helps with the business.  Mairam would like to take out a loan of 10,000 Somoni to buy spring fabrics.  She is relying on your kindness and support.

loans.use: to buy fabrics

loans.name: Iskandar

texts.ru: Искандар женат и ответственный отец пятерых детей. Он очень добрый и трудолюбивый человек. Более 2 лет он занимается перевозкой людей. Имеет опыт в данном бизнесе. Раньше он занимался купли продажей отрезов. Затем начал работать таксистом и арендовал автомашину. Затем постепенно получив несколько раз займа от «Имон Интернешнл» купил автомашину, а теперь работает на своей автомашине. Данный момент запрашивает займ для ремонта своего автомобиля, чтобы продолжать свою работу. Он надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en: Iskandar is married and the responsible father of five children.  He is a very kind and hard-working man. For more than two years he has been in the business of transporting people.  He has experience in this business.  He used to sell fabric remnants.  Later he began working as a taxi driver in a rented car.  Then, after several loans over time from IMON International, he bought a car.  Now he works for himself in his own taxi.  At the present time, he is requesting a loan for car repairs in order to continue his work.  He is relying on your help and charity.

loans.use: to repair his car

loans.name: Azizakhon

texts.ru: Азизахон замужем и любящая мать двоих детей. Муж работает на алюминиевом заводе  инженером. Более 10 лет она занимается купле- продажей тканей для  пошива одеял. Начинала свой бизнес со своей сестрой, торговала верхней одеждой, потом постепенно начала свой бизнес и встала на ноги. Чтобы расширить и увеличить бизнес она впервые получила займ от «Имон Интернешнл», и дела пошли успешно и займ помог ей для расширения бизнеса. Имеет хорошую кредитную историю. Азизахон запрашивает займ еще раз в размере 3000$ США для покупки тканей. Она надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en:
Azizakhon is married and the loving mother of two children.  Her husband is an engineer in the aluminum plant.  For more than 10 years she has been selling fabric for sewing blankets.  She began her business selling outerwear with her sister.  Then, little by little, she was able to start her own business and now she stands on her own two feet.  

In order to expand and grow her business, she took out a loan from IMON International and her business took off.  The loan helped her with the expansion of her business.  She has an excellent credit history.  Azizakhon is requesting a new loan for $3,000 to buy fabrics. She is relying on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy fabrics

loans.name: Richard

texts.en: Richard is the owner of a community deli and grocery in Eastern Pennsylvania. Six years ago, he used his own savings to invest and transform what was a small bakery, into a full operating deli and grocery. From the start, the business proved to be profitable and continues to grow. Now, Richard wants to give back to his community for all the help that they have given him through the early years. Richard is looking to expand his business to accept EBT (food stamps) payments, as a convenient avenue for these residents of the community. However, the city has strong demands for approval of a business that will provide this service. Richard has to reformat his store to show that he can adequately provide this service. This loan will be used to help convert his business and gain approval of the city. He would also like to expand his marketing to make the community aware of these new changes.

loans.use: to reformat his store to accept EBT services and expand his marketing

loans.name: Richard

texts.en: After working as a technician for five and a half years, Rick branched out and started his own event planning company in 1993. His company is now a full service party planner, which organizes corporate events, private parties, karaoke nights, weddings and much more. Along with the planning aspect, he also provides DJ services when needed and has recently purchased a photobooth, which he rents for his events as well as other independent events. Currently, the company gets 90% of their clients from referrals and word of mouth. However, they continue to see steady growth. Rick would like to see his business continue to grow and thinks that more consistent growth would occur with a better marketing scheme. This loan would be used to increase marketing for the company and secondarily as a credit builder.

loans.use: to increase marketing and build credit

loans.name: John

texts.en: John received his first job in the office furniture industry as a customer service assistant and was able to work his way up into sales in a very short period. Now, with 15 years of experience, John owns and operates his own full service office furniture dealership, which provides delivery services, installation, and space management consulting. After seven years with his previous employer, John branched off and started his own small business with the help of a few of his previous customers. He now represents 45 repeat customers and has three full time employees. As the owner, John wears many hats. Performing many tasks from unloading furniture to managing the warehouse, his main concentration is on sales. Over the last year, he has been working very hard and has lined up numerous large accounts, making 2012 the most profitable year yet. To provide for these new accounts, he would like to set up another warehouse and buy more inventories.  With this loan, John hopes to grow his business exponentially in 2012.

loans.use: to set up an additional warehouse and increase inventory

loans.name: Shavkatzhon

texts.ru: Шавкатжон более 11 лет занимается выращиванием ячменя. Он очень трудолюбивый и добросовестный человек. Он женат и ответственный отец троих детей. Шавкатжон также занимается скотоводством. Он хочет расширить свой бизнес и тем способом улучшить свое благосостояние семьи. Шавкатжон запрашивает займ в размере 5500 Сомони для приобретения 2 голов крупного рогатого скота, а на остальную сумму хочет купить горюче- смазочные материалы для посева ячменя. Он надеется на вашу помощь и поддержку.
texts.en: Shavkatzhon has been growing barley for over 11 years. He is a very hardworking and conscientious person. He is married and a responsible father of three children. Shavkatzhon also raises livestock. He would like to expand his business in order to improve his family's well-being. Shavkatzhon is requesting a loan of 5500 Tajik somoni (TJS) to purchase two cows. With the remainder of the funds he would like to purchase fuel and lubricants used in sowing barley. He hopes for your assistance and support.

loans.use: To buy cattle, fuel and lubricants

loans.name: Zulfiya

texts.ru: Зулфия трудолюбивая и добросовестная женщина. Она замужем и любящая мать троих детей. Зулфия занимается животноводством более 25 лет. Она имеет большой богатый опыт и знает все стороны бизнеса. В этом году она начала одновременно заниматься выращиванием ячменя. В бизнесе помогают муж и сыновья. Зулфия хотела бы получить займ в размере 3000 Сомони для покупки 2 голов крупного рогатого скота с целью расширения бизнеса. Она надеется на ваше понимание и помощь.
texts.en: Zulfiya is a hardworking and conscientious woman. She is married and a loving mother of three children. Zulfiya has been in business raising livestock for over 25 years. She has extensive experience and is knowledge about all aspects of the business. This year, she also began growing barley while simultaneously maintaining her livestock business. Zulfiya's husband and sons help her with the business. She has requested a loan of 3000 Tajik somoni (TJS) to purchase two cows with the goal of expanding her business. She hopes for your understanding and assistance.

loans.use: To buy cattle

loans.name: Munira

texts.ru: Мунира трудолюбивая и честная женщина. Она разведена и любящая мать двоих детей. Более 12 лет она занимается купле- продажей скота. С большим трудом и  усилием она вырастила своих детей и хочет, чтобы они стали образованными и воспитанными человеками. Данный момент она имеет 3 голов крупного рогатого скота. Мунира запрашивает займ для покупки 2 голов крупного рогатого скота с целью расширения бизнеса. Она хочет получить хорошую прибыль для того чтобы выдать свою дочку замуж. Она надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Munira is a hardworking and honest woman. She is divorced and is a loving mother of two children. For over 12 years, she has been in business buying and reselling livestock. She has worked hard to raise her children and wants to ensure they become educated, well-mannered adults. Currently Munira has three head of cattle. She is requesting a loan to purchase two more with the goal of expanding her business. She hopes to make a good profit so that she can arrange her daughter's marriage. She hopes for your assistance and your kindness.

loans.use: To buy cattle in order to expand her business

loans.name: Ravshan

texts.ru: Равшан трудолюбивый и добросовестный семьянин. Более 25 лет он занимается купле- продажей скота. За эти многие годы он набрал богатый опыт и успешен в своем деле. Данный момент он имеет 1 голов крупного рогатого скота. Он хочет расширить свой бизнес и увеличить поголовье скота, чтобы получить хорошую прибыль. Кроме этого он занимается  выращиванием сельхозкультур и хочет получить хороший урожай от данного бизнеса. Равшан запрашивает займ в размере 1700 Сомони для покупки горюче- смазочных материалов, семян и минеральных удобрений. Равшан надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Ravshan is a hardworking and conscientious family man. For over 25 years he has been in business buying and reselling livestock. Over this long period of time, he has gained rich experience and is successful in his business. Currently he has one head of cattle. He would like to expand his business and increase the number in his herd in order to make a good profit. Aside from raising livestock, Ravshan grows various crops and hopes for a good harvest from this business. He is requesting a loan of 1700 Tajik somoni (TJS) to purchase fuel, lubricants, seeds and fertilizer for planting. Ravshan hopes for your help and kindness.

loans.use: To purchase of seeds, fertilizers, fuel and lubricants

loans.name: Amonullo

texts.ru: Амонулло женат и любящий отец шестерых детей. Он очень трудолюбивый и честный человек. Более 20 лет Амонулло занимается купле- продажей скота и набрал богатого опыта. В бизнесе помогают жена и дети. От ранее полученных займов от «ИМОН Интернешнл» получил хороший доход и его бизнес расширился. Амонулло запрашивает займ в размере 3000 Сомони для покупки двух голов крупного рогатого скота и корма для них. Он надеется на вашу поддержку и помощь.
texts.en: Amonullo is married and is a loving father of six children.  He is a very hardworking and honest person.  Amonullo has been involved in buying and selling livestock and gained a rich experience in this business.  His wife and children help him in this business.  He earned a good income from earlier loans from "IMON International" and expanded his business.  Amonullo is requesting a loan in the sum of 3000 Somoni to buy two heads of cattle and livestock feed.  He relies on your support and help.

loans.use: to buy cattle and livestock feed

loans.name: Bahrom

texts.ru: Бахром честный и добросовестный человек. Он очень хороший семьянин и на воспитании имеет двоих детей. Баром более 20 лет занимается купле- продажей скота и имеет хорошую условию на содержании скота. Кроме этого он занимается выращиванием сельскохозяйственных культур. Отходы от выращивания идут на корм скота. В бизнесе помогают жена и сыновья. Бахром хотел бы получить займ для покупки двух голов крупного рогатого скота с целью расширения бизнеса. Он надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en: Bahrom is an honest and conscientious person.  He is a very good family man and is raising two children.  Bahrom has been involved in buying and selling livestock for 20 years and has good conditions for keeping livestock.  Besides this, he is involved in growing agricultural crops.  The leftovers from growing go toward feeding livestock.  His wife and children help him with the business.  Bahrom wants to obtain this loan to buy two heads of cattle in order to expand his business.  He relies on your help and mercy.

loans.use: to buy cattle in order to expand his business

loans.name: Safarali

texts.ru: Сафарали трудолюбивый и добросовестный человек. Он женат и на воспитании имеет четверо детей. Более 16 лет он занимается купле- продажей продуктов питания. Имеет магазин и много постоянных клиентов. Он всегда привозит свежие продукты. Жена занимается домохозяйством. Сафарали хотел бы получить займ для покупки муки, сахар, масло, колбасные изделия и конфеты с целью расширения бизнеса. Сафарали надеется на вашу доброту и помощь.
texts.en: Safarali is a hardworking and conscientious person.  He is married and raising four children.  He has been involved in buying and selling food products for over 16 years.  He has a store and many regular customers.  He always brings in fresh products.  His wife is involved in household work.  Safarali wants to obtain this loan to buy flour, sugar, butter, sausage and candy in order to expand his business.  Safarali relies on your kindness and help.

loans.use: to buy food in order to expand his business

loans.name: Sharifjon

texts.ru: Шарифджон уже 6-ой год занимается выращиванием скота. Недавно женился и в настоящее время имеет одного ребенка. Он сам и его нигде не обучались, занимались только скотоводством. Шарифджон очень старательный человек и старается улучшить благосостояние семьи и для этого хочет увеличить поголовье скота и расширить бизнес таким путем. С прибылью он планирует купить орг.технику для обучения своего ребенка, чтобы он стал образованным. Шарифджон запрашивает займ для покупки скота с целью расширения бизнеса.
texts.en: Sharifjon has been involved in fattening up livestock for the sixth year now.  He recently got married and currently has one child.  He did not get education anywhere and has only been involved in animal husbandry.  Sharifjon is a very diligent person and tries to improve his family's welfare, and for this, wants to increase livestock headcount, and, thus, expand his business.  He plans to use the profit to buy office equipment for teaching his child, so that he becomes educated.  Sharifjon is requesting this loan to buy livestock in order to expand his business.

loans.use: to buy cattle in order to expand his business

loans.name: Sadriddin

texts.ru: Садриддин трудолюбивый и честный семьянин. На воспитании имеет шестерых детей из них пятеро несовершеннолетние. После развала СССР он потерял свою работу и начал самостоятельно заниматься в сфере агробизнеса. Более 20 лет он занимается выращиванием сельхозпродукции и в основном он выращивает лук. В данное время он арендует землю для выращивания и хочет получить хороший урожай. Садриддин хочет получить хорошую прибыль и планирует построить дом и купить телевизор для улучшения условий семьи. Садриддин запрашивает займ для покупки семян репчатого лука и минеральных удобрений. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Sadriddin is a hardworking and honest family man.  He is raising six children, five of whom are adolescent.  After the breakup of the USSR, he lost his work and started to work in the agricultural business on his own.  He has been involved in growing agricultural crops for over 20 years and primarily grows onions.  Currently, he leases land for growing and wants to get a good harvest.  Sadriddin wants to make a good profit and plans to build a house and buy a television in order to improve his family's welfare.  Sadriddin is requesting this loan to buy onion seeds and mineral fertilizers.  He relies on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy seeds and mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Murod

texts.ru: Мурод женат и на воспитании имеет четверо детей. Он занимается ремонтом обуви, одновременно занимается купле продажей скота. Помимо этого он занимается выращиванием сельхозкультур и отходы от выращивания идут на корм скота, поэтому ему выгодно содержит скот. В бизнесе помогают жена и дети. Он в этом бизнесе уже более 20 лет и имеет богатый опыт в этом сфере бизнеса. Мурод запрашивает займ в размере 2000 Сомони для покупки семян пшеницы и ячменя для посева.
texts.en: Murod is married and is raising four children. He repairs shoes, and also has a business buying and reselling livestock. In addition to these two ventures, Murod grows crops. He uses the scrap to feed his animals, making it profitable to raise cattle. Murod's wife and children help him with the business. He has been raising animals for over 20 years now and has extensive experience in this field. Murod is requesting a loan of 2000 Tajik somoni (TJS) to purchase wheat and barley seeds for planting.

loans.use: To buy wheat and barley seeds

loans.name: Ikrom

texts.ru: Икром женат и ответственный отец двоих детей. Более 12 лет он занимается купле- продажей овощей. Он торгует на рынке, и его жена помогает ему. Икром и его сын имеет среднее образования, и он хочет, чтобы его младший сын и внуки получили высшею образованию и стали хорошими специалистами. С этой целью он хочет расширить свой бизнес, чтобы получить хорошую прибыль. Икром запрашивает займ для покупки сельхозпродукции с целью расширения бизнеса. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Ikrom is married and is a responsible father of two children. For over 12 years, he has been in business retailing vegetables. He sells at the market and his wife helps him. Ikrom and his son both have secondary school education and he hopes that his younger son and grandchildren will grow up to complete higher education and become well-trained professionals. To see this dream come true, he wants to expand his business and make a good profit. Ikrom is requesting a loan to purchase vegetables so he can expand his business. He hopes for your help and kindness.

loans.use: To buy vegetables

loans.name: Ikrom

texts.ru: Икром трудолюбивый и добросовестный человек. Он женат и любящий отец пятерых детей. Более 9 лет он занимается откормом и продажей скота. Этот бизнес является семейным и он успешно продолжает. Данный момент он имеет 3 голов скота. Жена помогает по бизнесу. Икром хотел бы получить займ в размере 5000 Сомони для покупки скота и корма для них. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Ikrom is a hardworking and conscientious person. He is married and a loving father of five children. For over 9 years, he has been in business fattening livestock for resale. This is a successful family business and Ikrom's wife helps him run it. Currently Ikrom has three head of cattle. He would like to receive a loan of 5000 Tajik somoni (TJS) to purchase cattle and cattle feed. He hopes for your help and kindness.

loans.use: To buy cattle and cattle feed

loans.name: Zohidchon

texts.ru: Зохидчон трудолюбивый и добрый человек. Он женат и любящий отец двоих детей. Более 9 лет он занимается купле- продажей скота. В обороте имеет 1 голов крупного и 8 голов мелкого рогатого скота. Одновременно занимается выращиванием пшеницы. В бизнесе помогает жена, и они вместе старается улучшить жилищные условия семьи. Зохидчон запрашивает займ для покупки скота и корма для них. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Zohidchon is a hardworking and kind person. He is married and a loving father of two children. For over 9 years he has been in business buying and reselling livestock. His inventory currently consists of one head of cattle and 8 sheep. Zohidchon also grows wheat. His wife helps him with the business and together they are working to improve their family's living conditions. Zohidchon is requesting a loan to purchase cattle and cattle feed. He hopes for your help and kindness.

loans.use: To buy cattle and cattle feed

loans.name: Ibrohimjon

texts.ru: Иброхимджон трудолюбивый и умный человек. Он женат и на воспитании имеет двоих детей. Более 5 лет он занимается купле- продажей скота и выращиванием кукуруза. Жена помогает по бизнесу. Иброхимджон старается расширить свой бизнес, чтобы улучшить благосостояние семьи. Он хотел бы получить займ в размере 10000 Сомони для покупки минеральных удобрений и семена. Иброхимджон надеется на вашу помощь и заранее благодарен вам за вашу щедрость и милосердие.
texts.en: Ibrohimjon is a hardworking and intelligent person. He is married and is raising two children. For over 5 years he has been in business buying and reselling livestock and growing corn. His wife helps him with the business. Ibrohimjon is trying to expand his business so that he may improve his family's overall well-being. He would like to receive a loan of 10,000 Tajik somoni (TJS) to purchase mineral fertilizer and seeds. Ibrohimjon hopes for your help and thanks you in advance for your generosity and kindness.

loans.use: To buy seeds and mineral fertilizer

loans.name: Shavkat

texts.ru: Шавкат женат и любящий отец троих детей. Он очень трудолюбивый и умный человек. Более 10 лет он занимается купле- продажей скота. Он имеет очень богатый опыт в этом сфере бизнеса. В обороте имеет 2 голов дойную корову и теленку. Жена помогает по ухаживанием и откормом скота. Кроме того Шавкат занимается выращиванием пшеницы. Шавкат старается расширить свой бизнес, чтобы получить хорошую прибыль и с этой целью запрашивает займ в размере 2500 Сомони для покупки корма для скота. Он надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en:
Shavkat is married and the loving father of three children. He is a very hardworking and smart man.  For more that 10 years he has fattened and sold cattle.  He has a wealth of experience in this area of business.   He now has an inventory of two milking cows and a calf.  His wife helps him feed and care for the cattle.  Besides this, Shavkat also grows wheat.  

Shavkat is trying to expand his business so he can earn a good profit.  With this goal in mind, he is requesting a loan of 2,500 Somoni to buy cattle feed.  He is relying on your help and charity.

loans.use: to buy cattle feed

loans.name: Ahlilo

texts.ru: Ахлило трудолюбивый и добросовестный человек. Он женат и любящий отец двоих детей. Более 15 лет он занимается купле- продажей скота. В обороте имеет 3 голов крупного и 5 голов мелкого рогатого скота. Начал бизнес с 2 голов крупного рогатого скота. Данный момент он хочет улучшить свое жилищные условия и запрашивает займ в размере 6000 Сомони для покупки обои и краски для ремонта своего дома. Он надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en: Ahlilo is a a hardworking and conscientious man.  He is married and the loving father of two children.  For more than 15 years has traded in cattle.  He has 3 head of cattle and 5 head of sheep and goats.  He started his business with 2 head of cattle.  At the present time, he wants to improve his housing conditions and is requesting a loan for 6,000 Somoni to buy wallpaper and paint for renovating his home.  He is relying on your help and charity.

loans.use: to repair his house

loans.name: Abduali

texts.ru: Абдуали женат и ответственный отец двоих детей. Более 10 лет он занимается купле- продажей скота и выращиванием сельхозкультур. С детства он привык к физическому труду и поэтому любит работать на поле. После женитьбы сына его финансовое состояние ухудшилась, не смотря на это, он усердно работает, чтобы восстановить свое состояние. Дополнительно выращивает рис, и дети помогают на обработки земли и посева сельхозкультур. В этом году он планирует посеять другие виды сельхозпродукции. С этой целью запрашивает займ для покупки семян сельхозпродукции.
texts.en: Abduali is married and the conscientious father of two children.  For more than 10 years he has traded in cattle and has grown crops.  He has been accustomed to physical labor since childhood and because of this, he loves to work in the fields.  After his son's marriage, his financial position worsened, but through it all he keeps working hard to restore it.  Additionally, he grows rice and his children help him with tilling the ground and planting the seed.  This year he is planning to plant other kinds of crops.  With this as a goal, he is requesting a loan for the purchase of seed for these crops.

loans.use: to buy seed

loans.name: Sunnatullo

texts.ru: Сунатулло трудолюбивый и добрый парень. Он занимается купле- продажей скота. С детство он помог отцу ведь его отец занимался откормом скота. Вот уже 6 лет он занимается этим бизнесом самостоятельно и набрал богатого опыта. Сунатулло хотел бы получить займ для покупки крупного и мелкого рогатого скота с целью расширения бизнеса. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Sunnatullo is a decent, hardworking young man.  He is in the cattle business.  Beginning in his childhood, he helped his father with fattening cattle for resale.  Now, he has been in the business independently for 6 years already and he has gained a wealth of experience.  With the goal of expanding his business, Sunnatullo would like to take out a loan to buy cattle, sheep, and goats.  He is relying on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Gairat

texts.ru: Гайрат трудолюбивый и честный человек. Он очень добрый семьянин. Более 15 лет он занимается купле- продажей одеялами на местном рынке. В бизнесе помогает жена. Кроме этого он имеет дополнительный бизнес, дома занимается откормом скота. Гайрат хотел бы получить займ для покупки новых товаров с целью расширения бизнеса. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Gairat is an honest and hardworking man. He is a very bighearted family man.  For more than 15 years he has been selling blankets at the local market.  His wife helps him with the business.   Besides this, he has an additional business:  at home he fattens cattle for market.  With the goal of expanding his business, Gairat would like to take out a loan to buy new merchandise.  He is relying on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy merchandise

loans.name: Giyosiddin
