Dahiana ha encontrado grandes inconvenientes con la fabricación de su propia línea de prendas de vestir, sin embargo, ha encontrado con su esfuerzo el camino para seguir adelante. Actualmente Dahiana quiere ofrecer productos nuevos en su línea de prendas de vestir, por lo que quiere comprar una máquina estampadora. Sin embargo, Dahiana no cuenta con el capital suficiente para poder realizar esta compra, por lo que aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de una máquina estampadora para su taller de confección.

Dahiana sueña con tener una línea propia de prendas de vestir en la que se vea reflejado todo su esfuerzo y empeño por salir adelante. Además, sueña con que sus padres puedan gozar de una mejor calidad de vida y de mayores oportunidades económicas para progresar. Dahiana espera poder generar mucho empleo para personas muy necesitadas que no encuentran oportunidades laborales.
texts.en:
Dahiana is a young entrepreneur who has always wanted to get ahead and to provide an income that will help sustain her household. Dahiana is a seamstress and thanks to her work she has been able to get ahead economically. She learned her work from her family, because her mother and her aunt have also been seamstresses their entire lives. 

Dahiana has been adding her own creations to her work little by little and has built a good clientele to whom she can market her own line of clothing. Dahiana has faced some big challenges in creating her own line of clothing but has discovered the inner resources to keep moving forward. 

Now Dahiana wants to offer new products in her clothing line which is why she wants to buy a printing machine. Unfortunately she does no have enough capital to make this purchase, which is why she is requesting a loan. 

Dahiana dreams of having a line of clothing that reflects her efforts and her drive to succeed. She would also love to see her parents have a better quality of life and more economic opportunities. Dahian hopes to create jobs for people in need and without other work opportunities.

loans.use: to buy a printing machine for her sewing workshop.

loans.name: Carlos Arturo

texts.es:
Carlos es una persona reconocida por ser muy trabajadora y tener un gran carisma. Carlos desde muy joven aprendió la actividad de la agricultura, pues su padre se dedicó gran parte de su vida a esta actividad. Desde el fallecimiento de su padre, Carlos heredó su trabajo y ahora es el que saca su cultivo adelante y con el que genera los ingresos necesarios para su sustento. Debido al mal clima que se ha tenido durante los últimos meses, sus cultivos se han visto muy afectados y esto se refleja en el poco crecimiento de sus siembras, es por esto que Carlos busca un préstamo que le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de semillas, abonos, insecticidas y fungicidas para sacar adelante su cultivo.

Carlos espera que de esta manera su cultivo pueda seguir creciendo y pueda generar los productos de buena calidad. Carlos sueña con tener un gran cultivo y con poder generar empleo para las personas que más lo necesitan.
texts.en:
Carlos is a person who is known for being hardworking and having a lot of charisma. Since he was very young, Carlos learned about agriculture, since his father spent a large part of his life in this activity. When his father passed away, Carlos inherited his job and now it is him who gets the crop ahead and who generates the necessary income for support. Due to the bad weather in the last few months, his crops have been very affected and this is reflected in the lack of growth in his plantings. That is why Carlos is seeking a loan that will afford him the opportunity to access the purchase of seeds, fertilizers, insecticides and fungicides in order to get his crops ahead. 

Carlos hopes that this way his crop can keep growing and he can generates products of good quality. Carlos dreams of having a good crop and being able to generate employment for the people who need it the most.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, insecticides and fungicides to get his crop ahead.

loans.name: Sandra Patricia

texts.es:
Sandra es una madre soltera cabeza de familia de 2 hijos, pues el padre de sus hijos falleció hace un tiempo y ella quedó encargada de los ingresos de su hogar. Sandra, gracias a que tiene la cualidad de ser muy trabajadora ha podido generar los ingresos suficientes para el sostenimiento de sus hijos. Sandra recibió del fallecimiento de su esposo el vehículo de transporte escolar que este manejaba, por lo que ella siguió operando este vehículo durante un tiempo para generar los ingresos para su hogar. Debido a problemas de salud, Sandra tuvo que dejar de manejar el vehículo y consiguió quién se lo trabajara, pero como ahora ya no recibía los mismos ingresos del vehículo de transporte, pues debía pagar el salario de quien lo manejaba, Sandra tuvo que conseguir un segundo empleo para poder sostener los gastos de su hogar. Sandra, como todavía es la encargada del mantenimiento del vehículo de transporte, debe garantizar el óptimo funcionamiento del mismo; es por esto que ahora que se encuentra averiado busca un préstamo que le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la reparación del motor del vehículo de transporte escolar con el cual genera sus ingresos.

Sandra espera que de esta manera pueda seguir generando los ingresos que provienen de este vehículo y pueda seguir ofreciéndoles a sus 2 hijos una buena calidad de vida. Sandra sueña con que sus hijos tengan una buena estabilidad económica y con que puedan acceder a una educación de buena calidad.
texts.en:
Sandra is a single mother and head of household for 2 children; the father of her sons died some time ago, leaving her solely in charge of generating income for the home.  Thanks to the fact that she is a hard worker, Sandra has been able to generate enough money to support her children.  Upon her husband’s death, Sandra inherited the school vehicle that he drove.  She continued driving this vehicle in order to generate revenue for the family.  Because of health problems, Sandra had to stop driving and hire someone else to do it instead.  This, however, did not generate the same level of income because she had to pay the person a salary.  Sandra had to find a second job in order to support herself and her children.  Because Sandra is still charged with maintaining the vehicle, she must guarantee that it is working properly.  For this reason, she finds herself seeking a loan that will afford her the opportunity to make repairs to the motor for the school vehicle that generates her income.

Sandra hopes to, in this manner, continue receiving the income generated by this vehicle and continue offering her 2 children a good quality of life.  Sandra dreams of providing financial stability for her kids and giving them access to a quality education.

loans.use: to repair the engine of her school transportation vehicle which generates her income.

loans.name: Sandra Maritza

texts.es:
La señora Sandra tiene 35 años de edad, es casada, vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos de 6 y 4 años de edad. Ella tiene ocho meses de dedicarse a la venta de calzado, venta de lácteos y destazo de animales para vender la carne. El negocio de calzado y los lácteos los tiene en casa de sus papas ya que la vivienda esta ubicada en el centro de la ciudad. El negocio del destazo lo hace en su vivienda y es una herencia familiar.

La prioridad en este momento, es surtir su venta de calzado, comprar estantes para que sea más atractivo para los clientes y por eso solicita el préstamo a Fundación Campo. El calzado se lo traen de Nicaragua a través de pedidos. Con el préstamo ella desea superarse como comerciante y tener dinero para cancelar el préstamo, brindarles la educación a sus hijos ya que ellos van creciendo y ahorrar para un mejor futuro. Ella desea continuar mejorando su negocio de calzado, comprando otros accesorios para vender más.
texts.en:
Sandra is 35 years old, married and she lives with her husband and two children, aged 4 and 6. She has been selling shoes, as well as dairy products and meat, for 8 months. She operates her dairy and shoe business in her parents' home because it is closer to the center of the city. She operates the meat and butchering business out of her own home, which is a family inheritance. 
 
Her priority right now is to stock up on shoes and to buy shelves in order to make her business more attractive to her customers. That is why she is requesting a loan from Fundación Campo. She orders the shoes from Nicaragua. With the loan she would like to become a better businesswoman and earn enough to pay back her loan, provide an education for her children who are getting bigger everyday, and save a little for the future. She wants to keep improving her shoe store and eventually buy other accessories as well in order to increase her sales.

loans.use: to buy more shelves and stock for her shoe business.

loans.name: Roberto Arturo

texts.es:
Roberto es una persona reconocida en su municipio por su carisma y sus ganas de trabajar. Roberto es un hombre casado y padre de 3 hijos a los cuales siempre ha educado con el mejor ejemplo y siempre queriendo brindarles la mejor calidad de vida. Roberto se dedica al corte de césped en los jardines de su municipio, y tiene muy buenos clientes gracias a la calidad de su trabajo. Debido al uso de su guadañadora, Roberto tiene su herramienta de trabajo muy desgastada, es por esto que ahora quiere renovarla pero no cuenta con el capital suficiente para realizarlo. Es por esto que Roberto acude a un préstamo con la esperanza de que le brindará la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de una guadañadora para ejercer su actividad con una mejor herramienta de trabajo.

Roberto sueña con que su trabajo le genere ingresos con los cuales su esposa y sus 3 hijos puedan tener una mejor calidad de vida. Además sueña con que su empleo crezca, se pueda convertir en una gran empresa de contratos y pueda emplear a muchas personas que requieran de unos ingresos para su hogar.
texts.en:
Roberto is well-known in his community for his charisma and his dedication to his work. He is married and has three children, who he has always tried to provide with the best quality of life possible. Roberto works cutting lawns in his community and he has a very good clientele thanks to the quality of his work. Because he uses his mower so much, it is really worn down. Roberto would like to buy a new one but he doesn't have enough money to do so. That is why he is requesting a loan: in order to buy a new mower and to be able to do his job better. 

Roberto's dream is that his work would provide enough income to provide him, his wife and three children with a better quality of life. He would also love to grow his business, win some new contracts and be able to employ people who need some additional income.

loans.use: to buy a new lawnmower in order to do his job better.

loans.name: Alejandra

texts.es:
Alejandra es una joven madre cabeza de familia de un hijo de 3 años, emprendedora y siempre dispuesta a salir adelante. Gracias a que el padre de su hijo la abandonó tuvo que garantizar el sustento para su hijo, por esto empezó a buscar alternativas de negocio y encontró en la venta de comidas una muy buena oportunidad. Alejandra vende platos de comidas a los habitantes de su región, quienes tienen sus platos como referencia por la buena calidad de los mismos. Gracias a esta actividad, Alejandra genera los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su hijo y con esto se puede brindar una buena calidad de vida. Debido a que no posee una nevera o un congelador donde pueda guardar sus comidas que requieran de refrigeración, Alejandra solo puede vender lo que pueda preparar en un día, pues no puede preparar sus comidas con anterioridad ya que se dañan sin tener refrigeración. Debido a esto Alejandra ha tenido que rechazar algunos pedidos de sus clientes y tener que seguir vendiendo poco a poco sus platos de comidas para que no se dañen. Con el ánimo de mejorar esta situación, Alejandra aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de un refrigerador que le permita guardar allí sus comidas preparadas y que no se dañen hasta el momento de su entrega.

Alejandra espera que de esta manera sus ingresos aumenten considerablemente, pues tendrá la oportunidad de atender a clientes que antes debía rechazar. Alejandra sueña con tener una gran casa de banquetes o con tener un gran restaurante. Además sueña con que su hijo pueda tener una estabilidad económica y con que en un futuro pueda acceder a una educación de buena calidad.
texts.en:
Alejandra is a young mother of one son who is 3 years old, entrepreneurial and always disposed to getting ahead.  Because the father of her son abandoned her, she has to guarantee sustenance for her son alone.  She started looking for business alternatives, and found a good opportunity in food sales.  Alejandra sells plates of food to the residents of her region, who have her cooking as reference for its excellent quality.  Thanks to this activity, Alejandra generates the necessary income to support her son and, with it, can provide a good standard of living.  Because she doesn’t have a refrigerator or freezer for storing perishable foods, she can only sell what she prepares in one day, as she can’t make her food earlier since it will spoil without refrigeration.  Because of this, Alejandra has had to turn down some orders from customers and sell her food little by little so it doesn’t go bad.  With the desire to improve this situation, Alejandra hopes that a loan will allow her to buy a refrigerator where she can preserve her prepared food until it’s served.

Alejandra hopes that this will allow her to augment her income considerably, since she’ll be able to tend to customers that she may have previously had to turn down.  Alejandra dreams of having a large banquet house or restaurant.  Her dreams include her son having financial stability and a good quality education in the future.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator that will allow her to preserve her prepared food until it's served.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es:
Maria del Carmen es una persona que siempre se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajadora y dedicada a su familia. Con 38 años de edad, se encuentra casada y es madre de 1 hijo al que siempre le ha querido brindar lo mejor posible. Maria del Carmen se dedica a la venta de productos de uso personal como lociones, shampoo, cremas, desodorantes, esmaltes, entre otros y gracias a esto le colabora a su esposo en la generación de ingresos para su hogar. Tiene muy buenos clientes, principalmente por el buen servicio que ofrece a sus clientes, y gracias a esto sus ventas han ido aumentando en los últimos meses. Debido a que tiene grandes pedidos por parte de sus clientes, que en el momento no ha podido satisfacer por la falta de capital para hacer la compra de los productos a su proveedor, Maria del Carmen busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de productos de uso personal para atender los grandes pedidos de sus clientes.

Maria del Carmen espera que su negocio siga creciendo para poder seguir contribuyendo a los ingresos de su hogar y permitir así que su familia tenga una mejor calidad de vida. Además, sueña con que su negocio crezca y poder montar un almacén donde ofrezca una gran variedad de productos y donde pueda emplear a personas que requieran de un ingreso para su familia y no han tenido oportunidades laborales. Maria del Carmen sueña con que su hijo pueda acceder a una educación de mayor calidad y en un futuro ingresar a una educación universitaria que le permita prepararse para un empleo bien remunerado.
texts.en:
Maria del Carmen is someone who has always been hard-working and dedicated to her family. She is 38 years old, married and has one child, who she has always wanted to provide for the best she can. Maria del Carmen sells personal use products like lotions, shampoo, creams, deodorants, nail polish and more. Thanks to this work she is able to contribute to the household income. She has really good customers, mainly because of the great service she offers them. As a result, her sales have been increasing over the past few months. Due to the increasing demand, which she hasn't been able to meet because she doesn't have the capital to purchase products from her supplier, Maria del Carmen is asking for a loan. The capital would allow her to buy more personal use products in order to meet the growing demands of her customers.

Maria del Carmen hopes her business will continue to grow and that she can continue contributing to the household income so her family can have a better quality of life. She also hopes to be able to open a store one day where she will sell a wide variety of products and where she could employ people who also need to make money to support their families. Maria del Carmen would love for her son to get a better education and to go to college one day, which would help him get a well-paid job in the future.

loans.use: to buy more personal use products and fulfill large orders from her customers.

loans.name: Jeanalyn

texts.en:
At 41 years old, Jeanalyn is still single. She focused on improving their poor living, that’s why she never bothers to get married. She is requesting a loan of 12,000 pesos to buy snacks and beverages to stock her store. She invests in it regularly because by better rotating stock she earns higher profits. 

This is precious to her because it would generate higher working capital and she could acquire a good variety of stock to offer.

loans.use: to buy snacks and beverages to stock her store

loans.name: Bella

texts.en:
Bella is a business-minded woman who has been supporting her family with her sari-sari (variety) store. She is 41 years of age and blessed with five children. 


Bella is asking for a loan amount of P8,000 to be able to have a variety of products to offer. She would buy more variety of biscuits, candies, sweets, juice and soft drinks that are usually ordered by her customers. It would attract more buyers and provide a good income for her to have a good quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more variety of biscuits, candies, sweets, juice and soft drinks

loans.name: Antonio

texts.en:
Antonio is 27 years old, single and lives with his parents at Cataggaman. He did not finished his college education, so he decided to work and earn income so that he would not be a burden for the family. He patiently provides motorcycle transport services to the people in their village. He provides the services daily from 6 am up to 6 pm. 

He is now asking for a loan of P7,000 to buy tires and spare parts to use on his motorcycle and ensures the safety of passengers and his life as well.  He hopes that someday, he can strengthen the business and keep earning good income from it. He is also dreaming of having his own family someday.

loans.use: to buy tires and spare parts to use on his motorcycle.

loans.name: Thelma

texts.en:
Thelma is helping her husband in managing their rice farming business. They helping each other, sharing ideas to get a better quality of crop that will sell at a high price. They are doing this just for the future of their children.

Thelma is 37 years of age and blessed with three children. She and her husband started farming business when they got married. Now, they have been 20 years in farming and still continue managing their farm because it is their primary source of income of the family.

Thelma wants to borrow a loan of P25,000 to buy seeds, fertilizers and herbicides to use in farming. She wishes to develop her skills in managing their farm to maintain the business and continue earning profits from the business.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers and herbicides to use in farming.

loans.name: Noemi

texts.en:
Noemi is a hard-working woman who sells fish and meat. She has been doing this for three years and it has contributed to a better standard of living.


She likes to drive and call out her products to sell. This is her simple strategy to sell and the same time earn high income. She is happily married to a loving farmer, a friendly and hard-working man who helps her in improving their lives.


She is requesting a loan of PHP 5,000 to buy fish and meat to sell and for the maintenance of her motorcycle. Her growing business is one of the most important things for her and her family.

loans.use: to buy fish and meat to sell and also maintain her motorcycle

loans.name: Maricel

texts.en:
Maricel manages a sari-sari (variety) store in their village where she is able to generate a monthly income of P5,000 which is used for daily allowances of children and daily needs of the family. She has been in this kind of business for almost 10 years. Maricel is 34 years old, married, and has three children. Two of them go to school while the other one is still an infant.

Maricel is aiming to increase the volume of her merchandise but her capital is not enough due to their household expenses and daily allowances of her children. For her to realize her goal, she is asking for a loan of P5,000. She hopes that she can obtain the loan amount requested. She believes that despite the situation she has gone through, someday she can attain success for her business.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her variety store

loans.name: Sonia

texts.en:
Sonia lives in her own house with her family (her husband and four children). She is a very hardworking and responsible mother. She has worked for 12 years selling fruits, vegetables and meat to help her family get ahead in life. She is in need of a lot of effort and patience in carrying her goods to sell every day.


Sonia does it every day because of her affection for her family. Right now, she is asking for a loan of 5,000 pesos to buy additional vegetables to sell. She hopes to gain more income through this amount and in this way, she can be able to save for her service.

loans.use: to buy additional vegetables to sell

loans.name: Adora

texts.en:
Adora is 41 years of age. She lives in the village of Villa Concepcion. Adora is a responsible mother, who is engaged in buying and selling vegetables in the village. She is thankful because aside from her business, Adora raises hogs in order to earn an income and to lift her family out of poverty. She usually raises hogs to fatten and breed. She has been doing her businesses for more than two years. 

Adora wants to improve her businesses and is in need of additional capital so she is now asking for a loan of P20,000 to buy vegetables such as squash, string beans and eggplant and additional piglets to raise. In the future, she would like to strengthen her small businesses and continuously acquire profits from them.

loans.use: to buy vegetables such as squash, string beans and eggplant and additional piglets to raise

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en:
Virginia believes that through hard work and wise management of her business she will somehow achieve her dreams in life. She is 33 years old and married to Arnel, a vendor of charcoal. They have seven children: four of them go to school; two are still very young, and the other one is out of school.

She is operating a variety store which is located within the local community where she lives. She has been running this business for one year. However, the income generated is not enough to meet all their basic needs. So Virginia would like to request a loan of P5,000 to purchase more merchandise for her store. This amount will definitely help her a lot, most specially in improving the business. In this way, she can obtain greater profit. She hopes to have a progressive family through her hard work and patience in managing her business.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her retail store

loans.name: Nancy Del Socorro

texts.es:
Nancy es una persona muy trabajadora y siempre se ha caracterizado por tener un gran carisma y muchas ganas de salir adelante. Nancy se encuentra casada y es madre de 3 hijos a quienes siempre les ha querido brindar lo mejor posible, es por esto que debido a que el sueldo de su esposo no era suficiente para poder cubrir todos los gastos de su hogar, Nancy decidió empezar a trabajar y contribuir con los ingresos de su hogar. Nancy empezó a trabajar en la cafetería de su hermana, y luego de un tiempo esta se la vendió. Nancy lleva aproximadamente 1 año como dueña de la cafetería y gracias a su buen servicio esta ha ido creciendo poco a poco. A menudo, Nancy tiene pedidos de sus clientes que no puede satisfacer, pues el surtido de su cafetería no es muy grande. Con el ánimo de revertir esta situación, de ir creciendo más su cafetería y hacerla más atractiva para sus clientes, Nancy busca un préstamo que le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de productos para su cafetería como son snack, bebidas, entre otros, y aumentar la variedad de productos que ofrece a sus clientes.

Nancy espera que de esta manera su cafetería siga creciendo y sus ventas se aumenten con el pasar del tiempo, para poder generar más ingresos que en su hogar requieren para gozar de una mejor calidad de vida. Nancy sueña con tener una gran cafetería donde pueda generar empleo para las personas más vulnerables y poder mejorarles la calidad de vida a otras personas diferentes a su familia. Además, sueña con que sus hijos puedan ingresar a una educación de calidad y tengan un futuro económico estable.
texts.en:
Nancy is a very hard-working person who has always been known for her great charm and her desire to do well in life.  She is married and has three children who she has always wanted to provide with the best she can.  As her husband's wage was not enough to cover their household expenses, Nancy decided to start working and contributing towards their household income.  She started off working in her sister's cafe and, after a while, her sister sold it to her.  Nancy has owned the cafe for approximately one year and, thanks to her good service, she has been gradually growing it.  She often has orders from customers that she cannot fill because she doesn't have much stock.  With the aim of changing this situation, further growing her cafe and making it more attractive for her customers, Nancy is looking for a loan which will enable her to buy products for her cafe such as snacks, drinks, etc. This will enable her to  increase the variety of products she has to offer her customers.

Nancy hopes that her cafe will continue to grow and that her sales will increase over time so that she can make more income that her household needs in order to enjoy a better quality of life.  Nancy dreams of having a big cafe where she can provide work for the most vulnerable people and help them improve their quality of life.  She also dreams of her children receiving a good education and enjoying a stable financial future.

loans.use: to buy products for her cafe such as snacks, drinks, etc.

loans.name: Sidaty Aïdara Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité Sidaty Aïdara existe depuis le 7 juillet 2011, il est composé de huit femmes qui habitent le même quartier pendant des années et sont unies par des liens solidaires et de parenté. Les activités principales sont l'embouche et le petit commerce.

Madame Kheule la responsable du groupe est âgée de 41 ans, elle est mariée et mère de quatre enfants; elle mène une activité de petit commerce de légumes et en même temps de l'embouche. Elle a une bonne expérience de plus de 10 ans dans ces deux secteurs. Debout à droite, elle est habillée en robe verte et a levé la main gauche.

Elle s'approvisionne en légumes (tomates,carottes, navets, oignons....)et en moutons au marché central de leur communauté rurale et revend sur place et dans son quartier.

Elle compte acheter des moutons et des légumes pour renforcer son commerce.

Elle aide son mari dans la prise en charge des dépenses de la famille.
texts.en:
The solidarity group Sidaty Aïdara has been in existence since July 7, 2011. It comprises eight women who have lived in the same district for years and who are united by ties of solidarity and kinship. Their main work involves fattening livestock and small-scale commerce. 

Ms. Kheule, the group's official, is 41 years old, married, and the mother of four children. She runs a small business selling vegetables and, at the same time, fattens livestock. She has ten years of good experience in these two sectors. In the photos, Ms. Kheule is the one standing at the right in a green dressed with her left hand raised. Her beautiful smile lights up her face. 

She gets her supplies of vegetables (tomatoes, carrots, turnips, onions...) and sheep at the central market in their rural community, and she resells them locally and in her district. 

Ms. Kheule plans on buying some sheep and vegetables to bolster her business. 

She helps her husband to cover family expenses.

loans.use: to buy sheep and vegetables to sell

loans.name: Sop  Serigne Fallou Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité est créé le 27 décembre 2010, il est composé huit femmes qui vivent en parfaite harmonie et dans un climat détendu. Leurs principales activités sont le petit commerce et l'embouche.

La responsable Yacine est âgée de 33 ans, elle est mariée et mère de trois enfants, elle mène une activité de petit commerce de niébé et d'arachide depuis 2 ans; elle a une expérience assez bonne. Elle est debout à droite à l'extrême habillée en vert-blanc.

Elle achéte et revend ses produits ("niébés" et des arachides) au marché du village.

Elle compte avec son prêt renforcer son commerce en achetant des stocks  de niébé et d'arachide pour se faire ainsi beaucoup de revenus.

Avec ses bénéfices elle aide son mari pour la nourriture et subvient aux besoins de ses enfants.
texts.en:
This solidarity group was set up on 27 December 2010. It is made up of eight women who get along well and are very relaxed around each other. Their main activities are small-scale trade and fattening livestock. 

The group leader, Yacine, is 33 years old. She is married and the mother of three children. She has been trading black-eyed peas and groundnuts for 2 years, so has quite a lot of experience. She is pictured on the far right in green and white.

Yacine buys and resells her products at the village market. With this loan, she hopes to build her business by buying supplies of black-eyed peas and groundnuts and thereby increase her revenue. The profits will go towards helping her husband with food costs and providing for her children.

loans.use: To buy beans and peanuts

loans.name: Florilyn

texts.en:
Florilyn is 40 years old and is married with six children. To earn a living, Florilyn has operated a retail store for three years. She earns about PHP 400 a day. 

Florilyn wants to expand her family business. That’s why she is taking out this loan in the amount of PHP 15,000 to purchase additional stock such as groceries, canned goods, shampoo, soap and other ingredients to sell.  

Florilyn hopes to grow and expand her general store to secure her family's future and educate her children so that they will become professional some day. Despite the hardships of life, she is striving hard to earn and save money for educational purposes.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock such as groceries, canned goods, shampoo, soap and other ingredients to sell in her store.

loans.name: Analyn

texts.en:
Analyn, age 34, has a retail shop business where she sells a variety of goods such as candy, cereal grains, detergent and snacks. She is requesting a loan of 5,000 PHP to buy additional goods such as sweets, breads, cooking oil, milk and candies to sell in her store.

Analyn needs to stock more goods in order to improve her income as well as to provide for the needs of her only child and future children.

loans.use: to buy additional goods such as sweets, breads, cooking oil, milk and candies to sell in her store.

loans.name: Magdalena

texts.en:
Magdalena is a resourceful mother who is involved in a hog-raising business to generate additional income to support her family. She is now 50 years old and has five grown children. Two of them are still in college and they want to finish their studies to earn their degrees and become professionals some day. Despite the hardships of life, they have the determination to work out their plan. 

To improve her business, Magdalena is requesting additional capital of PHP 25,000 to buy feed, vitamins and additional piglets to raise. She believes that this loan will help her and her family to make improvements in the business and hopes that they will be successful in carrying out their plans.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins and additional piglets to raise.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josphine is married and has four children. She buys and sells pigs. She has been in this business for two years and is successful at it. 

At this time, she would like to receive a loan in the amount of 7,000 PHP to buy feed and vaccines for her pigs. She believes that this loan will help her to improve her business and hopes that she will be successful in the future.

loans.use: to buy feed and vaccines for her pigs.

loans.name: Aminata  Alle Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe a été créé le 09 juillet 2011.IL est composé de 11 femmes issues du même quartier, elles sont unies par affinité, elles sont voisines et des parentes.

Sokhna est responsable du groupe de solidarité. Elle est assise à droite sur la photo. Elle est âgée de 53 ans. Elle est mariée et a en charge 01 enfant. 

Elle développe comme activité principale la vente de bois de menuiserie. Et comme activité parallèle elle fait un petit élevage de poulet. Son nouveau crédit lui permettra de financer ses activités de vente de bois de menuiserie et d'élevage de poulet 

Son objectif est de pouvoir subvenir à ses besoins personnels et de soutenir son mari dans la prise en charge de la famille.
texts.en:
This group was created on July 9, 2011. It is made up of 11 women who come from the same neighborhood. United by common interests, they are neighbors and relatives. 

 Sokhna is the leader of the group, sitting on the right on the bench in the photo. She is married and is 53 years old and is raising one child. Her primary business is selling wood for carpentry. As a second business, she raises chickens. Her new loan will allow her to fund her businesses of wood-selling and chicken rearing. 

Her goal is to support her needs and to assist her husband with supporting the family.

loans.use: to buy wood for carpentry and to buy chicks

loans.name: Sope Christa Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe Sope Christa est composé de 15 membres qui habitent dans un même village .
Il a tété crée depuis le premier cycle du BV .
Sa responsable actuelle Madame Jacqueline est une femme veuve âgée de 57 ans et mère de 2 enfants à sa charge.
Madame Jacqueline est membre du dit BV depuis son inauguration.
Son activité principal se trouve être l'embauche porcine et la vente porcs.
Son nouveau crédit de 20000 lui permettra d 'acheter 2 petits porcs qu'elle va revendre plus tard.
Avec ses bénéfices elle va payer les fournitures scolaires et acheter de la nourriture à ses enfants.
texts.en:
The Sope Christa group is made up of 15 members who all live in the same village. The group was created during the first cycle of the "banc villageois". It's current leader, Jacqueline, is a 57-year-old widow and mother of 2 dependent children.

Jacqueline has been a member of the "banc villageois" since its inauguration. Her principal business activity is pig fattening and selling. Her new loan of 20 000 francs will allow her to buy 2 small pigs which she will sell at a later date. She will use her profits to pay for her children's educational expenses and buy them food.

loans.use: to buy pigs destined for eventual resale.

loans.name: Sope Serigne Bara Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe a été créé le 15 décembre 2008.IL est composé de 07 membres issues du même village. Elles se sont réunies par affinité et par voisinage

Mame Daro (debout à droite de la photo) est responsable du groupe. Elle est âgée de 44 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 07 enfants et a 01 autre en charge confié par ses proches. 

Elle développe une activité de vente de poisson. Elle achète du poisson chez les mareyeurs qu'elle revend à sa  clientèle dans le quartier. Elle possède également d'une table au marché qui lui permet d'exercer la même activité sur étale. Elle mène cette activité depuis 05 ans	

Son objectif est d'augmenter son niveau d'épargne tout en participant à l'amélioration des conditions de vie de sa famille(santé , nourriture etc..)
texts.en:
This group was created on December 15, 2008. It comprises seven members from the same village. They have come together by affinity and community. 

Mame Daro (standing at the right in the photo) is the group's official. She is 44 years old, married, and the mother of seven children. And she supports one other child entrusted to her by those close to her. 

She is developing a business selling fish. She buys fish from wholesalers and then resells to her customers in her district. She also owns a table at the market that enable her to operate the same business displaying her goods. She has been in this business for five years. 

Her goal is to increase her level of savings while helping to improve her family's living conditions (health, food, etc.)

loans.use: to buy fish

loans.name: Elsa

texts.en: Elsa is 37 years old. She is married to Danilo, a small farmer in the village of Maligaya. Elsa operates a sari-sari (variety) store in front of her house. She usually earns PHP 250 a day. Elsa is now asking for a loan of PHP 15,000 to buy soft drinks, canned goods, sugar and cooking oil to sell in her village. She needs to stock more commodities in her store to increase the sales capacity of her business.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, canned goods, sugar and cooking oil to sell in her village.

loans.name: Prima

texts.en:
One of the principles that guides Prima in striving for a better way of life is having "patience in every circumstance." 

Prima is a vendor of different kinds of vegetables and charcoals. She has been in this business for six years and she is grateful that she is able to sustain her family's daily needs.

Prima is 45 years old and married with six grown children. Four of them have married while the other two are still studying. 

Prima says that the income generated from her business is not sufficient due to the large number of family members and daily allowances of her students. For this reason, Prima is requesting to borrow additional capital in the amount of PHP 5,000. She will use the money to buy different kinds of vegetables and stock charcoal for her vending activity. She hopes that she will obtain this loan amount so she can provide for her family's basic needs and improve the financial stability of the family.

loans.use: to buy different kinds of vegetables and stock charcoal for her vending activities.

loans.name: Majellan

texts.en:
Majellan engages in selling fruits and vegetables in his village to provide for his family's needs. He is 48 years old. He aims to lift his family out of poverty.

In this regard, Majellan plans to improve his business and to make it a viable source of income. Because of insufficient capital, he is asking for a loan of PHP 7,000 to buy eggplant, bitter melons, squash, onions and bananas to sell in his village. He believes that he can improve the business through his patience and strong determination.

loans.use: to buy eggplant, bitter melons, squash, onions and bananas to sell in his village.

loans.name: Jorge Armando

texts.es:
Jorge lleva aproximadamente 12 años en la actividad de las instalaciones de redes de gas, actividad que aprendió de un familiar y con la cual hoy genera los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su hogar. Jorge se encuentra casado y es padre de 1 hijo, el cual por su corta edad requiere de mucha atención y también genera grandes gastos para su familia, es por esto que Jorge siempre busca aumentar sus ingresos para poder ofrecerle a su hijo un crecimiento de calidad y a su esposa ofrecerle una mejor calidad de vida. Jorge en la actividad de la instalación de redes de gas es muy eficiente, y gracias a esto es muy reconocido entre sus clientes y esto le ha llevado a tener muy buenos contratos. Sin embargo, la actividad tiene muchos tiempos muertos, donde Jorge no encuentra contratos para desarrollar su actividad y tiene conflictos para la generación de ingresos para su hogar. Con el ánimo de mejorar esta situación, Jorge ha aprendido la actividad de la instalación de redes eléctricas y gracias a esto ha podido diversificar su trabajo y poder tener menos riesgo a quedarse sin ingresos para su hogar. Gracias que ahora desempeña esta actividad con buena calidad, Jorge quiere comprar sus herramientas para trabajar, por lo que busca un préstamo que le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de herramientas para desempeñar la actividad de la instalación de redes eléctricas, y tener así una nueva fuente de ingresos paralela a la instalación de redes de gas.

Jorge espera que de esta manera sus ingresos no se vuelvan a ver afectados, pues en esta nueva actividad encuentra mucho trabajo, y así podrá ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y una estabilidad económica que les permita tener mayores oportunidades de progresar.
texts.en:
Jorge has been installing gas lines for approximately 12 years.  He learned this trade from a family member and it makes him the income he needs to support his household.  Jorge is married and has one child who, because of his young age, needs a lot of care and also creates large expenses for his family.  For this reason, Jorge is always looking to increase his income so that he can offer his son a good childhood and offer his wife a better quality of life.  Jorge is very efficient in his work as a gas installer and he is very well known among his customers.  This has meant that he gets very good contracts.  However, the business has many times when there isn't much work and Jorge cannot find contracts.  This makes it hard for him to make income for his household.  With the aim of improving this situation, Jorge has learned how to work as an electricity installer and has been able to diversify his work so that he runs less risk of being unable to make income for his household.  Now that he carries out this business well, Jorge would like to buy some work tools.  He is looking for a loan that will enable him to buy tools for carrying out his work as an electricity installer.  This will give him an additional source of income on top of the money he makes installing gas lines.

Jorge hopes that a lack of income will no longer cause him problems as he is finding a lot of work in this new business.  This means he will be able to offer his family a better quality of life and financial stability which will give them more opportunities for making progress.

loans.use: to buy tools so that he can carry out an additional business installing electricity

loans.name: Mèdédjigbé Céline

texts.fr:
Mèdédjigbé Céline est mariée et mère de quatre enfants. Elle vend dans sa boutique des divers produits
( des tasses,des plats, de la farine de gari, de l'arachide, des produits défrisants, du sucre, des mèches, des bonbons et chewing -gum,du lait corporels,  des boites de sardines, du détergent etc  ). Elle fait recours au financement de FINADEV-SA pour satisfaire sa clientèle et surtout subvenir aux besoins de ses enfants
texts.en: Mèdédjigbé Céline is 34 years old, married and the mother of 4 children. She sells various home and body products in her shop (cups, plates, "gari" flour, peanuts, hair gel, sugar, hair extensions, candy, gum, body lotion, sardines, and detergent) in her shop and is requesting financial help from FINADEV-SA so that she can diversify her products and meet the needs of her loved ones.

loans.use: to buy a box of cups, a box of plates, a bag of gari flour, a bucket of groundnuts, a box of hair relaxers, a palette of sugar, a dozen sets of hair extensions, 2 boxes of sweets, 2 boxes of chewing gum, a dozen bottles of body milk, a dozen boxes of sardines and a box of detergent.

loans.name: Assiba Nicole

texts.fr: Assiba Nicole, âgée de 47 ans est mariée et à 05 personnes à charge. Elle vend à domicile des divers(du maïs, des pattes alimùentaires, de farine de gari, de l'huile, du haricot blanc). Pour mieux garnir son commerce elle est venue auprès de Finadev solliciter un prêt afin de satisfaire sa clientèle et de subvenir aux besoins de ses enfants.
texts.en: Assiba Nicole is 47 years old, married and responsible for 5 people. She sells cereals and various products door to door (corn, pasta, gari flour, oil, and white beans). She is requesting a loan from Finadev in order to improve her business by better satisfying client demand and meeting her family's needs.

loans.use: to buy 5 bags of corn, 1 carton of spaghetti, 1 carton of macaroni, 1 bag of gari flour, a 25-litre can of oil and half a bag of white beans.

loans.name: Noélie Afiavi

texts.fr: Mère de deux enfants, Noélie Afiavi vit en location avec son mari. Elle vend des divers, poissons frais, viandes fraîches, des produits de la SOBEBRA, du bissap et de la glace.  Soucieuse de renforcer son fonds de commerce, elle sollicite et obtient un concours auprès de Finadev afin d'accroître son stock et participer aux charges familiales.
texts.en: Mother to 2 children, Noelle Afiavi lives in rented accommodation with her husband. She sells various products: fresh fish, fresh meats, Sobebra products, bissap (hibiscus flower) and ice. Keen to strengthen her business, she has requested and obtained funds from Finadev in order to increase her stock and contribute to the family expenses.

loans.use: to buy 4 boxes of frozen products and 5 cases of different types of drinks.

loans.name: Emma Dénise

texts.fr: Divorcée, Emma Dénise vit en location avec ses trois enfants. Elle est distributrice de chaussures, sacs et pagnes.  Elle a également deux filles qui vont vendre quotidiennement. Dans le but d'élargir son activité, elle fait  recours à Finadev et obtient un micro-crédit afin de maximiser son intérêt et de faire face à ses charges ainsi que celles de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Divorced, Emma Dénise lives in rented accommodation with her 3 children. She is a distributor of footwear, bags and pagnes (highly decorative and colourful West African fabric). Two of her daughters also go out and sell the merchandise on a daily basis.

With the aim of expanding her business, Dénise requested and obtained a micro-credit loan from Finadev so that she could maximise her interest and cover her and her children's expenses.

loans.use: to buy 20 bags and 15 pairs of shoes of varying quality.

loans.name: Souhad

texts.en: Souhad is a 20-year-old Lebanese married woman living with her husband. Since their marriage, Souhad and her husband find it really hard to cover their life needs, that’s why they’re now both working in order to earn superior income. Souhad started to work as an independent beautician from her home in 2009 and has her loyal customers. Today, she needs to borrow a youth loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to buy added beauty supplies for her business in order to collect higher income. In the future, she plans to open her own beauty salon.

loans.use: to purchase beauty supplies for her home-based salon

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Shadi

texts.en:
Shadi is a 33-year-old Lebanese single man living with his parents and only one working sibling. His father is the one taking care of his family and covering their costs. Shadi has owned a cafe in his town for three years. People also meet at his place to enjoy their time with friends. 

Today, he wants to borrow a loan from Kiva Partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase the needed quantity of food provisions such as chocolats, coffee, soft drinks, sweets and many others. This will surely increase his sales and allow him attract added customers. In the future, he plans to open a small snack bar just next to his cafeteria.

loans.use: to purchase the needed quantity of food-related provisions such as charcoal, coffee, soft drinks and many others

loans.name: Samar

texts.en:
Samar is a 46-year-old mother of four from the Negev in Israel’s southern region. She raises sheep for sale which brings much needed income to her family. Sales are seasonal, with high demand during holidays. During this time of year, Samar must invest in increasing the number of sheep she has to be prepared for the seasonal demand in the future. Samar buys ewes and small sheep to raise and makes a profit after she raises them for resale.

Samar needed this loan to purchase additional sheep and feed for the animals.

In the future, Samar wants to see her business continue and expand but most importantly, ensure her children gain an education.

loans.use: To purchase additional sheep and feed for the animals.

loans.name: Lilia

texts.en:
Lilia is 50 years old and has seven grown children. She and her husband have agreed to lift up their living conditions and educate their children to give them a better future. Both of them are farmers, and they raised their family in a village. They help one another in managing their farm lot but their income is not sufficient to satisfy their needs due to the high cost of commodities and school fees. 

In this regard, Lilia operates a hog-raising business to generate additional income. She plans to strengthen her business and make it a viable source of income. But due to inadequate capital, she is requesting a loan of PHP 25,000 to buy piglets, feed, vitamins and vaccines needed for hog-raising. Despite the problems and difficulties they have encountered in life, Lilia believes that she will make improvements to her business through patience and hard work.

loans.use: to buy piglets, feed, vitamins and vaccines needed for hog-raising.

loans.name: Eduard

texts.en:
Eduard is from the village of De Vera. He is 39 years old and married with two children. Eduard owns and operates a general store, selling a variety of different products in the local community. He has been engaged in this business for more than five years and earns approximately PHP 300 a day from it.

Eduardo is requesting a loan of PHP 10,000 to purchase additional products to sell such as canned goods, spices, drinks and snack foods.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell such as canned goods, spices, drinks and snack foods.

loans.name: Babylyn

texts.en:
Babylin, age 26, operates a small eatery in the school canteen as a source of income. She is married but not yet blessed with a child. 

Babylin is asking for a loan of PHP 5,000 to buy meats, vegetables and soft drinks. These goods will provide her with a higher income, enabling her to save money for her future children.

loans.use: to buy meats, vegetables and soft drinks.

loans.name: Fe

texts.en:
Despite problems and difficulties in life, Fe is determined to make an improvement in their status of living through patience and hard work. She is 33 years of age, married, and has four school-age children. She is engages in a hog-raising business to supplement her husband's income. She has been in this business for almost 4 years and usually earns a profit of PHP 8,000 when she sells two head of pigs.  She plans to improve her pigpen and raise more pigs so that she will have more pigs to sell. 

To work out her plan, she is requesting additional capital of PHP 25,000 to buy feeds, vitamins and vaccines needed in hog-raising. She believes that through this loan, she will be able to make an improvement in her business. Fe is hoping that someday she will become successful in her business.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vitamins and vaccines needed in hog-raising.

loans.name: Mila

texts.en:
Mila, age 47, is married and blessed with four children. She sells bananas as her main source of income. Her greatest desire is to provide a comfortable life to her family, so she is being responsible and industrious.

Right now, she is requesting a loan of 5,000 pesos to buy additional bananas to sell. It surely will increase her usual income. She just hopes that her customers will always be loyal to her. Through them, she can achieve her greatest dream.

loans.use: to buy additional bananas to sell.

loans.name: Maria

texts.en: Maria is 44 years old and is a widow.  She works hard to earn a living. She has been blessed with three children. Maria owns her variety store, and she has had this business for many years. She is aiming to increase her product offering to satisfy her customers' demands, but her income is inadequate. Therefore, she is asking for a loan amount of 20,000 Philippines pesos to buy grocery items such as canned goods, daily use products, curls, bread and candy to sell. She believes that her sacrifices will lead her to reach her goal, which is to increase her profit and save money for emergency purposes.

loans.use: to buy grocery item such as canned goods, daily use products, curls, bread and candy to sell.

loans.name: Felicidad

texts.en:
Felicida is married and has two children. She is engaged in the purchasing and selling of bananas. She has been doing this for over 20 years.

Since this business is the only source of income for her family, she would like to expand it and increase her profits. She is requesting a loan of 5,000 pesos to purchase a bulk of bananas and additional vegetables to sell.

loans.use: to purchase a bulk of bananas and additional vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Hernando Jaime

texts.es:
Hernando se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajador y generar nuevas ideas en su negocio para que este nunca se vea superado en ventas por la alta competencia que hay en su región. Hernando es muy reconocido por ofrecer un muy buen servicio a sus clientes, lo que ha hecho que cada vez capte más clientes y pueda mejorar sus ventas. Hernando se dedica, desde hace aproximadamente 12 años al alquiler de videojuegos, películas, e Internet, y gracias a esto genera los ingresos suficientes para poder sostener sus propios gastos y poder ofrecerles a sus padres una buena calidad de vida. Hernando se ha visto muy golpeado por la gran competencia que existen en su región, por lo que ha implementado nuevos servicios como el servicio de impresión de trabajos, plastificación de documentos, entre otros. Gracias a la buena clientela que ha acogido su alquiler de videojuegos e Internet, Hernando requiere de más aparatos que le permitan atender a todos sus clientes. Es por esto que Hernando busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de un computador y comprar videojuegos para alquilar a sus clientes.

Hernando espera que su negocio siga creciendo y sus clientes cada vez más reconozcan su negocio y lo tengan como un referente, de modo que sus ingresos sigan creciendo y pueda generar los ingresos necesarios para su sostenimiento y el sostenimiento de sus padres. Hernando sueña con tener una gran sala de videojuegos y un gran café Internet, donde pueda emplear a personas que requieran de unos ingresos para poder sostener su familia.
texts.en:
Hernando is noted for being a very hard-working man who creates new ideas for his business so that he is never beaten in terms of sales by the high level of competition that exists in his region.  Hernando is very well known for offering a very good service to his customers.  This has gained him additional customers and he has been able to improve his sales.

Hernando has been renting out video games and movies, and offering Internet access for approximately 12 years.  Thanks to this, he makes enough income to cover his own expenses and offer his parents a good quality of life.  Hernando has been hit by the high level of competition that exists in his region and so he has started providing new services such as printing, document lamination, etc.  Thanks to the good customer base that he has attracted with his video-game and Internet services, Hernando needs to buy more machines which will enable him to serve all his customers.  He is looking for a loan that will enable him to buy a computer and also video games to rent out to his customers.

Hernando hopes that his business will continue to grow and that his customers will further acknowledge how good his business is and consider it to be a standard in the field.  This will ensure his income continues to grow and he will be able to make the income he needs to support himself and his parents.  Hernando dreams of having a large video-game hall and a large Internet cafe where he can employ people who need income to support their families.

loans.use: to buy a computer and video games to rent to his customers

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria engaged in the buying and selling fruits in the market. She has been in her business for 20 years, and she usually receives P10,000 monthly from it. She wants to buy more fruits to sell, but she lacks the necessary capital. 

Thus, she is taking out this loan of PHP10,000 to buy apples, oranges and mangoes to sell in the market.  She believes that her sacrifices will lead her to reach her goal, which is to increase her profit and save money for future emergency purposes.

loans.use: to buy apples, oranges and mangoes to sell in the market.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.en:
Carmen is a hardworking mother who helps her husband in generating income to support their family. She is 45 and has two school-age children. She is engaged in a hog-raising business to make an income. Being responsible parents, they aim to continue sending their children to school so that they will earn a degree and become professionals someday. Despite financial difficulty, they have the determination to work out their plan. 

She aims to improve her hog-raising business to increase her income, but due to insufficient capital she is asking for a loan of P25,000 to buy additional piglets, feeds, vitamins and materials needed in hog-raising. She mentioned that this loan will help her to make an improvement in her business and that she is hoping that she will be successful in the future.

loans.use: to buy piglets, feeds, vitamins and materials needed in hog-raising.

loans.name: Leonora

texts.en:
Due to the lack of job opportunities, Leonora engages herself in selling fruits in her village to provide their needs. She is 55 years old and has one child. She aims to improve their status of living and to become economically stable.

In this regard, she plans to improve her business and to make it a viable source of income. Because of insufficient capital, she is asking for an additional amount of P10,000 to buy different fruits to sell in the market, such as oranges, apples and mangoes. She believes that she can improve the business through her patience and strong determination.

loans.use: to buy different fruits to sell, such as oranges, apples and mangoes.

loans.name: Gafurjon

texts.ru: Гафурджон более 6 лет занимается купле- продажей скота. Он женат и на воспитании имеет пятерых детей. Он покупает скот на местном базара и откармливает их более  шести месяцев, а потом продаёт в этом же базара за выгодную цену. Кроме данного бизнеса он занимается выращиванием сельхозкультур. Отходы от выращивания идут на корм скота. Гафурджон хотел бы получить займ для покупки 3 голов крупного рогатого скота с целью расширения бизнеса. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Gafurjon, who is married with five children, has been in cattle business for six years. He buys cattle at the local markets, fattens the animals over a period of six months and sells them at the same market at a higher price. In addition to this business, Gafurjon grows crops, which he also uses to feed the cattle. Gafurjon is applying for a loan to purchase three heads of livestock; this would allow him to expand his business. Gafurjon hopes for your help and kindness.

loans.use: To buy cattle

loans.name: Manolito

texts.en:
Manolito is a happy person who seems not to be encountering any difficulties in life. He says that difficulties are just challenges and ingredients to feel the journey of life. He is 41 years old, married, and has seven children. With the large number of children he has, he is always striving to have the faith that he can sustain his children's needs through his source of income, which is farming. His wife is a housekeeper and a vegetable vendor.

Manolito has been 22 years in managing his rice farming business. With his long experience in his business, Manolito is an expert in farming and is continually improving. His only problem in farming is needing financial assistance for the sustenance of his farm needs. This is the reason why Manolito is requesting a loan of P25,000 to buy farm supplies like seeds, fertilizers and insecticides.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies like seeds, fertilizers and insecticides.

loans.name: Manzura

texts.ru: Манзура замужем и любящая мать четверых детей. Более 8 лет она занимается шитьём ватное одеяло. Она покупает ткань дешевле, затем шьет одеяло и предоставляет клиентам. Данный бизнес приносить ей хороший доход. Манзура хотела бы получить займ в размере 5000 Сомони для покупки тканей. Она надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Manzura is a married mother of four. Over the past eight years she has been making cotton blankets. She buys well priced fabric, sews blankets and sells them. Her business is very profitable. Manzura would like to get a loan of 5000 somoni for purchasing fabric. She hopes for your help and kindness.

loans.use: To buy fabric

loans.name: Norberto

texts.en:
Patience and strong determination are Norberto's secrets of why he is still standing firm and able to sustain his family's needs. Despite having no stable job, he is not losing hope that he can carry his family out of poverty. He is married and has three children. Norberto engages himself in a farming business, which is the planting and harvesting of rice.

Due to the lack of capital, Norberto could not sustain his farm's needs to get better yields. In regard to this, he decided to borrow P25,000 to buy fertilizers, seeds and herbicides to complete the required needs for farming and being able to get better yields. He wants to get a higher income from farming to further support his family's needs.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, seeds and herbicides.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en: Elizabeth is 36 years of age and involved in selling clothes and bags that she sews. She has been doing this for eight years, and it contributes an improvement to their living. She is requesting additional working capital to expand her business as it grows. She is in need of 15,000 pesos to buy clothes, fabric, thread and string. She is hoping for better results from her business in order to have a good life and a good source of income.

loans.use: to buy clothes, fabric, thread and string.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a compressor and paint in order to make good quality products.

loans.name: Olimjon

texts.ru: Олимджон честный и трудолюбивый семьянин. Он занимается выращиванием сельхозкультур. На воспитании имеет четверых детей. После распада союза  он приватизировал землю, на которой много лет работали его родители. Он имеет многолетний опыт не только в скотоводстве, но и в земледелии. К сожалению, кризис в стране повлиял на его бизнес. Засуха, высокая конкуренция, отсутствие резерва и повышение цен на расходных материалов. Кроме того он провел несколько семейных обрядов, женитьбы племянника и стройка дома. В данный момент очень нуждается в финансовую поддержку и запрашивает займ для покупки семян лука и минеральных удобрений.
texts.en: Olimjon is an honest and hard-working family man and a father of four.  Since the collapse of the Soviet Union, he privatized the plot of land cultivated by his parents. Olimjon has many years of experience not only in livestock breeding but also in agriculture. Unfortunately, his business has been affected by the crisis in the country. Drought, competition, soaring prices of raw materials, lack of reserves and, at the same time, the need to carry on family life (his nephew's wedding, house construction) made it even more difficult to make ends meet. At the moment Olimjon is in dire need of financial help. He will use the loan to purchase onion seeds and mineral fertilizers.

loans.use: To buy seeds and mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Libardo

texts.es:
Libardo es una persona que es reconocida en su región por tener un gran carisma y siempre querer ofrecerles un bienestar a las demás personas. Libardo se encuentra casado y es padre de 6 hijos, a quienes siempre les brinda una buena educación y quiere ofrecerles una mejor calidad de vida. Libardo se dedica desde hace aproximadamente 10 años a la actividad de la compra y venta de frutas y verduras, actividad que aprendió trabajando para una empresa que hacía esto pero al ver que su empleo era muy mal remunerado decidió independizarse y sacar su propio negocio adelante. Libardo compra las cosechas de los agricultores de las veredas cercanas a su vivienda y luego las transporta hasta la ciudad para venderla en la plaza de mercados. De esta manera, Libardo afirma que el genera sus ingresos y a la vez le brinda una ayuda a los agricultores porque ellos no tienen como llevar sus productos hasta la ciudad, y la empresa que hace esto, para la que trabajaba Libardo, abusaba del trabajo de los Agricultores. Libardo le compra la mercancía a los agricultores a crédito, pues no cuenta con un buen capital para poderla comprar a contado, sin embargo, Libardo quiere cambiar esta situación, pues a menudo los agricultores necesitan el dinero para poder sostener sus propios gastos. Es por esto que Libardo aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de las frutas y verduras de contado, permitiéndoles a los agricultores recibir el dinero de contado y mejorar su calidad de vida.

Libardo espera que de esta manera tanto su calidad de vida, como la de los agricultores se vean beneficiadas y en un futuro puedan sacar en conjunto la región adelante. Libardo aspira a que sus hijos puedan gozar de una mejor calidad de vida y puedan acceder a una educación universitaria, además, quiere que su esposa pueda tener mejor calidad de vida y toda su familia mejores oportunidades de progreso.
texts.en:
Libardo is well-known in his area for his great charisma and good will in helping other people.  He is married and the father of six children to whom he has always given a good education, offering them the best he could.  For approximately ten years Libardo has been buying and selling fruit and vegetables.  He learned the trade while working for a company in the sector, but since he felt his job was not well paid he decided to become independent and set up his own business.  Libardo buys produce from farmers near his home and then travels to the city to sell it at the markets.  This way Libardo generates his own income and also helps the farmers because they have no way of transporting the goods to the city.  The company that does this type of thing, which is where Libardo worked before, used to abuse the farmers.  Libardo buys from the farmers on credit since he does not have enough capital to buy in cash.  But he wants to change this situation because the farmers sometimes need cash to cover their own expenses.  So Libardo is requesting a loan to buy fruit and vegetables in cash, which means the farmers will receive cash and improve their quality of life.

He is also hoping to improve his own quality of life since the farmers will be better off and this will benefit the region in the future.  Libardo wants his children to have a better lifestyle and access to a university education.  He also wants a better lifestyle for his wife and more opportunities for his family.

loans.use: To buy fruit and vegetables in cash, so the farmers receive cash and can improve their quality of life.

loans.name: Yeghishe

texts.en: Yeghishe lives in Areni village with his wife and two children. Yeghishe works at a local factory. Besides this, he is involved in cattle breeding. Yeghishe also has a machine for agricultural work, which he uses for land cultivating for other villagers. Yeghishe has applied for a loan to purchase wheels for the machine and to pay for the motor renovation. This will allow Yeghishe to make his work more effective and cultivate more land, increasing his income. With additional income Yeghishe plans to expand his farm in the future.

loans.use: to pay for wheels and motor renovation.

loans.name: Hovhannes

texts.en: Hovhannes is 26 years old. He lives with his parents. Hovhannes is involved in cattle breeding. Hovhannes's parents help him run the farm. Unable to find sufficient financial means to develop his farm, Hovhannes has applied for a loan. With the loan's help he plans to purchase cattle and forage. This loan will help Hovhannes increase his income and insure a better life for his family in the future.

loans.use: to pay for cattle and forage.

loans.name: Santos De Los Ángeles

texts.es:
La señora Santos tiene 58 años de edad, es casada y tiene tres hijos. Ella vive con su esposo y sus hijos entre las edades de 16 y 12 años. Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora que se dedica desde hace 10 años a la agricultura, crianza de cerdos y a la ganadería, fueron sus padres quienes le enseñaron desde la edad de 18 años la llevaban a trabajar al campo y fue así como aprendió las labores que requieren los cultivos de maíz, pipían, etc. Con lo que ella conoce de la agricultura hoy se dedica a sus labores propias que son una fuente de ingresos en su hogar. Ella tiene que viajar a la ciudad durante cuarenta y cinco minutos en autobús, compra los insumos agrícolas en compañía de sus hijos

El préstamo que esta solicitando Santos es para comprar 4 sacos de sulfato, 2 sacos de formula y el resto lo destinara para comprar una ternera. Con la inversión ella podrá cultivar maíz y el pipían ya que trabaja muy fuerte estos cultivos. De la venta de la cosecha de pipían planea pagar el crédito y el resto lo invertirá en la compra de más ganado ya que ahorita tiene 12. Más adelante la señora Santos quiere comprar otro motor para poder realizar sus riegos en los cultivos más rápido y que la producción sea abundante, para sacar adelante a sus tres hijos con el estudio.
texts.en:
Mrs. Santos, 58, is married and has three children.  She lives with her husband and children, who range in age from 16 to 12.  She is a very hard worker who, for ten years, has been involved in farming, raising pigs and livestock.  Her parents taught her the trade at the age of 18 when she used to go with them to the fields and learned how to grow corn, squash, etc.  Now she does her own farming which is the source of income for her household.  She has to travel by bus, a 45-minute ride, to the city where she buys farm supplies with her children.

The loan Santos is requesting is to buy four sacks of sulphate, two sacks of formula and the rest to buy a calf.  With this investment she will be able to plant corn and squash, which are her two main crops.  With the income from the squash she will pay back the loan.  The rest will be used to buy more livestock since now she has 12.  In the future Santos wants to buy another motor to make crop irrigation quicker and production more abundant, so she can give her children an education.

loans.use: To buy four sacks of sulphate, two sacks of formula and use the rest to buy a calf.

loans.name: Armenak

texts.en: Armenak is 51 years old. He lives with his wife and two children. Armenak has been involved in cattle breeding for twelve years, and during this period he has created favorable conditions to develop his farm. Armenak plans to use this loan to purchase cattle and forage. This will allow him to get more income from agriculture and improve the living conditions of his family.

loans.use: to pay for cattle and forage.

loans.name: Ruzanna

texts.en: Ruzanna is 56 years old. She lives in Karakert village with her family of six: husband, son, daughter- in-law, two grandchildren and mother - in - law. For already fifteen years she has been engaged in cattle breeding and land cultivating. Ruzanna has applied for this loan to increase the number of cattle. She also plans to purchase forage for the cattle. Ruzanna hopes she will increase the income from cattle breeding, which is vital for her to meet the family's ends.

loans.use: to pay for cattle and forage.

loans.name: Artur

texts.en: Artur is 27 years old. He lives with his wife, parents and two children. Artur has applied for this loan to expand his farm. Artur plans to purchase calf. This will allow Artur to make his dream come true and find a big farm in the future. A big farm means stable income and higher living standards for Artur and his family.

loans.use: to pay for calf.

loans.name: Anibal De Jesus

texts.es:
Anibal se ha caracterizado durante toda su vida por ser muy trabajador. Es padre de 2 hijos de 10 y 7 años, a los cuales su madre abandonó hace un tiempo, por lo que actualmente se encuentran a cargo de Anibal. Siempre les ha querido brindar la mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos, por esto se esfuerza en su trabajo todos los días con el ánimo de sacar su familia adelante. Anibal se dedica a la agricultura, actividad que aprendió de su padre, y desde entonces esta ha sido la actividad con la cual genera los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su hogar. Anibal ha tenido muy difícil la producción de sus cultivos debido al mal clima que ha hecho en los últimos meses, y esto se ve reflejado en la calidad de sus cultivos. Anibal busca potenciar su cultivo y hacer que pueda crecer de buena calidad, además de organizar su cosecha con una malla para que no se le estén metiendo animales a pisarle sus cultivos. Es por esto que Anibal busca un préstamo que le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de riegos e impermeabilizantes, semillas y una malla que le permitan cultivar sus productos con buena calidad.

Anibal espera que su cultivo pueda crecer de buena calidad y de esta manera pueda vender sus productos a un buen precio, y poder ofrecerle a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida. Anibal sueña con tener un gran cultivo y tener también ganado para la cría y venta de los mismos y dejarles a sus hijos una estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Anibal has been characterized throughout his life as being a hard worker. He is the father of two children, 10 and 7 years old. Their mother abandoned them some time ago, so currently they are under Anibal's care. He always wanted to provide the best quality of living for his children, which is why he strives every day to work with the intention of moving his family forward. 

Anibal is a dedicated crop farmer, a trade learned from his father. Ever since it has been the revenue-generating activity needed to sustain their home. Anibal encountered severe production difficulties in recent months due to bad weather, which had an impact on crop quality.

Anibal wants to enhance his production and ensure its improved quality, and improve the harvest by using mesh netting to prevent animals from damaging the crops.

Anibal is therefore seeking a loan so that he can purchase irrigation and water-protection equipment, seeds and mesh netting enabling him to grow good quality crops. Anibal is hoping for good quality crops so that he can sell his products at a good price, and offer his children a better quality of living.

Anibal's dream is to operate a large farm including the breeding and selling of livestock, which will provide his children with economic stability.

loans.use: Purchase irrigation and water-protection material, seeds and mesh netting that will allow him to grow good quality products

loans.name: Carmen Janeth

texts.es:
Carmen es una persona que ha tenido que pasar por muchas dificultades en su vida, sin embargo, las ganas de salir adelante y su cualidad de trabajadora le han hecho superar estas adversidades y seguir progresando en su vida. Carmen es una madre soltera cabeza de familia de 1 hijo de 3 años, al cual su padre nunca quiso aportar para su sostenimiento y a Carmen le tocó sostener su crecimiento por su propia cuenta. Debido a que Carmen no contaba con un empleo y apenas estaba estudiando, tuvo que abandonar sus estudios y conseguirse un empleo que le permitiera generar los ingresos suficientes para poder sostener los gastos de su hijo. Carmen aprendió entonces la actividad de la venta de productos de uso personal como desodorantes, cremas, lociones, entre otros y la venta de ropa, todo a través de catálogos, y gracias a esto puede generar sus ingresos. El trabajo le ha servido a Carmen porque este le da buenos ingresos y no requiere de la disponibilidad de tiempo completo, lo que le permite compartir tiempo con su hijo para poderle ofrecer un cuidado durante su crecimiento. Gracias al buen servicio que ofrece Carmen, sus ventas han aumentado cada vez más, y gracias a esto su familia pueda gozar de una mejor calidad de vida. Actualmente tiene un gran pedido de ropa por parte de un cliente suyo por lo que requiere comprar la mercancía a su proveedor, sin embargo, no cuenta con el capital suficiente para realizar esta compra; es por esto que tiene la esperanza en que un préstamo le brindará la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de ropa para responder a un gran pedido que le ha hecho un cliente suyo.

Carmen espera que de esta manera pueda seguir generando los ingresos suficientes para el sostenimiento de su hijo y poder ofrecerle un buen crecimiento. Además, Carmen sueña con tener un almacén donde pueda ofrecer todos sus productos a una clientela más grande y donde le genere ingresos de los que ella pueda disfrutar con una mejor calidad de vida. Carmen le quiere ofrecer a su hijo en un futuro una buena educación y una estabilidad económica que le permita tener mejores oportunidades de progreso.
texts.en:
Carmen has experienced many difficulties in her life.  Nevertheless, her desire to get ahead and the quality of being a hard worker have made her overcome these adversities and continue making progress in her life.  Carmen is a single mother and head of the family with one child, a three year old.  The child’s father never wanted to contribute to his support.  Carmen had to support him on her own.

Because Carmen was not employed and was only studying, she had to abandon her studies.  She had to find employment that would allow her to generate sufficient income to be able to support her son’s expenses.  Carmen then learned the business activity of selling personal products like deodorants, creams, and lotions, among others, and selling clothes.  She makes all of these sales through catalogs.  Thanks to this she is able to generate income.

The work has served Carmen well because it gives her good income, and it does not require her to be available full time.  This allows her to spend time with her son and to be able to take care of him while he is growing up.  Thanks to the good service that Carmen offers, her sales have increased more and more.  Thanks to this her family is able to enjoy a better quality of life.

She currently has a large clothing order from one of her customers.  She needs to buy merchandise from her provider, but she does not have enough money to make this purchase.
